GK16visa07cu:0: saptamaḥ paricchedaḥ iha hi prathamataḥ kāvye doṣaguṇarītyalaṅkārāṇāmavasthitikramo daśitaḥ,
GK16visa07cu:1: saṃprati ke ta ityapekṣāyāmuddeśakramaprāptānāṃ doṣaṇāṃ svarūpamāha---
GK16visa07cu:3: (vi, ka) iha hi prathamataḥ prathamaparicchede doṣānāmavasthitikramo 'vasthitiprakāro darśita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:6: “utkarṣahetavaḥ proktā guṇālaṅkārarītayaḥ'; ityuktyā ca guṇādīnāmutkarṣakatvenāvasthitiprakāro darśita iti /
GK16visa07cu:7: atra ca rītyalaṅkārāṇāmiti pāṭhastu uddeśavyutkrameṇa lekhakapramādaparamparayaiveti lakṣyate
GK16visa07cu:10: (lo, a) kāvyasvarūpaṃ nirūpya doṣān nirūpayitukāmaḥ tatprastāvaṃ darśayati /
GK16visa07cu:27: pade tadaṃśe vākyer'the saṃbhavanti rase 'pi yat // VisSd_7.1 //
GK16visa07cu:29: (lo, i) te punariti--te doṣāḥ padatadaṃśādipañcake sthitā yasmāt vākyārthabhūtasyāsvādasyāpakarṣakāraṇāni tasmāt pañca prakārāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:38: aprayuktatā ityatra dvandvottarasya bhāvapratyayasya pratyekamabhisambandhāt duḥ śravatvādaya eva doṣāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:39: etadādyavimṛṣṭavidheyāśabhāvāntāḥ trayodaśa doṣāḥ padavākyayoḥ pade vākye 'pi sambhavanti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:42: nirarthakatvamasamarthatvaṃ cyutasaṃskāratā ceti doṣatrayaṃ paraṃ kevalaṃ pade natu vākye ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:45: (lo, ī) tatra ke doṣāḥ kiniṣṭā ityata āha--duḥ śraveti /
GK16visa07cu:55: etacca vīrabībhatsaraudrān rasān vihāya iti bodhyam, teṣu tasyānuguṇatvādeva /
GK16visa07cu:57: samagrapadavyāpakatve tu pratikūlavarṇatvadoṣa eva ityadi boddhavyam
GK16visa07cu:71: tatra vrīḍājugupsayoḥ kārakatvaṃ maṅgalasya ca jñāpakatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:75: (vi, cha) dṛptārīti---sādhanaṃ senā ca cārthaḥ prākaraṇikatvāt anekārthasya sādhanaśabdasya vācyaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:76: puṃvyañjanarūpastvartho vyaṅgyaḥ śrotṝṇāṃ vrīḍājanakaḥ; natu vrīḍāvyañjakaḥ tadapratīteḥ /
GK16visa07cu:80: he tanvi ! tava vināśe adarśane sati tadā mama duḥ khotpādanāya vāyuḥ
GK16visa07cu:90: vināśaśabdaśca adarśanārthe maraṇasya ca smāraṇāt kameṇa vrīḍādivyañjakāḥ
GK16visa07cu:97: vināśaśabdaśca adarśanārthe maraṇasya ca smāraṇāt krameṇa vrīḍādivyañjakāḥ
GK16visa07cu:108: tena idānīntanānekakavibhiḥ prācīnaikakavinā vāsyā'dare 'pi doṣa eva /
GK16visa07cu:109: evañca “padmān hi me prāvṛṣi khañjarīṭān “iti naiṣadhakṛtā prācīnaikakavinā ādare 'pi doṣa eva /
GK16visa07cu:110: kāvyavyatirikte bhāṣāmātre tadādare tu adoṣa eva, ityataḥ nānuśāsanaprāmāṇyam /
GK16visa07cu:126: yogaśastra eva na tu loke arthaśāstre vā /
GK16visa07cu:131: te ca manasi varttamānāḥ puruṣe apadiśyante iti /
GK16visa07cu:132: kiñcaivaṃ vaktṛboddhavyayoḥ śāstrānabhijñatvabodhādiṃ vinā doṣa iti /
GK16visa07cu:134: “āśaīḥ paramparāṃ vandyāṃ karṇe kṛtvā kṛpāṃ kuru” /
GK16visa07cu:135: atra vandyāmiti kiṃ bandībhūtāyāmuta vandanīyāmiti saṃdehaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:148: aśaktikṛtaṃ kaverasāmarthyamātreṇa kṛtaṃ na tu rūḍhiprayojanayoḥ anyatareṇa kṛtamityarthaḥ
GK16visa07cu:157: darśitaṃ hi sthāne sthāne lakṣyārthāteśayaḥ prayojanamiti cet, na /
GK16visa07cu:161: prakṛte nirjitatve lakṣyārthe mukhaniṣṭhaśobhājanyatvameva vivakṣito yogaścaraṇāghāte mukhyārthe cālīke tacchobhābhāvāt tajjanyatvanirjitatvaṃ na pratīyata eva /
GK16visa07cu:162: tataśca tadapratītyā asyā lakṣaṇāyāḥ kaviprayogānarhatvajñānena aśraddheyatvāt lakṣyārthatiśayaḥ prayojanaṃ na pratīyate eva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:169: śambaraśabdo daitye prasiddhaḥ, iha tu jale nihatārthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:172: yamunāyāḥ śambaraṃ jalam ambaram ākāśaṃ vyatānīt vyāptamityarthaḥ
GK16visa07cu:174: atreti---naca napuṃsakaliṅgarūpavyaktiviśeṣāt jalasyaiva upasthitiriti vācyam, tulyaprasiddhikasthale eva tasya niyantritatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:175: atra tu prasiddhivaśāt liṅgānanusandhāne 'pi padamātreṇaiva prathamataḥ tadupasthityavalambanāt liṅgasyānvayasya ca bodhāttu paścādeva jalapratīteḥ /
GK16visa07cu:182: atreti na ca ghadhātornānārthatvena dāne grahaṇe 'pi śaktirastyeva,
GK16visa07cu:183: āṅupasargeṇa tu dānabodhapratibandha evetyataḥ śakyārthe kathaṃ śaktibhrama iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:184: upasargasya pratibandhakatvakalpane kāraṇībhūtābhāvapratiyogitvapraveśena gauravāt, tadapekṣyā āḍupasargarahitasyaiva dāñaḥ dāne śaktirityasyaiva yuktatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:185: ḍudāñ dāne iti sāmānyataḥ śaktidarśanāttu śaktibhramaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:186: neyārthe tu bhramabījābhāvāt na bhrama iti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:187: ato neyārthatvalakṣaṇe śaktibhramābhāve sati iti viśeṣaṇādānādasāṅkaryam /
GK16visa07cu:188: avācake ca śaktibhramāt vivakṣitārthe tātparyasattvāt tātparyarūpāyā lakṣaṇāyā vivakṣitārthatvabodhakatvamastyeva iti /
GK16visa07cu:191: parantu iyaṃ lakṣaṇā na neyārtho, nāpi kaviprayogārheti bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:192: nirthakādidoṣapatrayasya tu vākyadoṣatvaṃ na sambhavatīti tadapāsyam
GK16visa07cu:200: (vi, tha) yathā vā--”dinaṃ me tvayi saṃprāpte dhvāntacchannāpi yāminī /
GK16visa07cu:202: dhvāntacchannāpīti apikāreṇa dhvāntacchannatvaviparītabodhanāt prakāśamayatvasyaiva tadviparītabodhāt na tu dinatvasya /
GK16visa07cu:219: atra kṣīrodajā lakṣmīstasyā vasatiḥ padmaṃ tasya janmabhuvo jalāni /
GK16visa07cu:228: atreti---bhavasya patnītyarthe sādhitasya bhavānīśabdasya arthena patiśabdārthasya anvayavaśāt caitrasya bhāryāyāḥ patirityatra iva upapatipratītyānindā /
GK16visa07cu:230: (lo, au) bhavānīśabdo bhavasya patnītyarthe nadādau ānapratyayāntaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:234: atra vṛthātvaṃ vidheyam, tacca samāse guṇībhāvādanuvādyatvapratītikṛt /
GK16visa07cu:237: sa ca samabhivyāhārapratītisākṣiko na tu gata eva /
GK16visa07cu:238: tathā hi prāṅnirddiṣṭavidheyakaṃ bahuvrīhiṃ vinā samāsāntare vidheyasya pāte, asamāse tu uddeśyāt pūrvavidheyasya pāte tathātvam /
GK16visa07cu:243: tasyedānīṃ vṛthātvamityataḥ ucchūnatve uddeśye vṛthātva vidheyam /
GK16visa07cu:244: taccātra karmadhārayasamāsagatatvenāvimṛṣṭamityarthaḥ bahuvrīhisamāse prāṅnirddiṣṭaṃ vidheyaṃ tu vidheyatayaiva pratīyate /
GK16visa07cu:246: 'dhara”ityatra rāge nirmṛṣṭatvasya citragurityatra gavicitratvasya ca vidheyasya vidheyatayaiva sārvalaukikī pratītiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:247: na tu karmadhāraye vidheyapāte tadavimarśa iti satyam /
GK16visa07cu:251: yatra tūddeśyatāvacchedake vidheyamanveti tatra vidheyatayaiva pratīteḥ ānubhāvikatvānna doṣaḥ
GK16visa07cu:252: yathā”eṣvayamatyanvapaṇḍita”ityatra atyantasya vidheyasya uddeśyatāvacchedake pāṇḍitye evānvayo vidheyatayaiva pratītiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:255: kaṭhinaṃ khalu te cetaḥ śirīṣasyeva bandhanam //
GK16visa07cu:258: tathā ca prakṛte 'pi ucchūnatvena uddeśyatāvacchedakenānvitasya vṛthātvasya kathamavimṛṣṭatvam. ucchūnabhuje vṛthātvasya tu kiṃpadenaiva uktatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:260: hyayameva me yadahayaḥ'; ityatra vākyagataṃ vidheyāvimarśamudāharati /
GK16visa07cu:261: atra caraṇe ucchūnatvamātraṃ cānuvādyaṃ natu vṛthātvaviśeṣitam”ityuktam, tena vidheyāvimarśadoṣo vidheye darśitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:265: tathā hi svargaviluṇṭhane ucchūnatvameva janyate natu tad vṛthātvaṃ vṛthātvaviśeṣitamucchūnatvaṃ vā /
GK16visa07cu:268: 'nanvayādabhavanmatayogadoṣa eva darśitaḥ na cābhavanmatadoṣasya vākyamātragāmitvameva tenoktaṃ kathaṃ,”samāsaikapade tatsambhava”miti
GK16visa07cu:275: ayamāśayaḥ-- tatpuruṣasamāse uttarapadasyaiva prādhānyāt vṛtheti pūrvapadasya vidheyasya prādhānyenānirddeśādavimṛṣṭavidheyāṃśo doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:277: iha vakturdaśamukhasyāyamāśayaḥ--purā mama bhujānāṃ yad ucchūnatvaṃ sthitaṃ taditānīṃ vṛthābhūtamiti
GK16visa07cu:278: evaṃ vidheyatvena vivabhitasya vṛthātvasya samāse guṇībhāvādanuvādyatvapratyayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:279: tena ca pūrvato bhujānāmucchūnatvasya vṛthātvābhāvād bhujānāmapakarṣa eva pratīyate na bhujavikṣepaṇotkarṣaḥ
GK16visa07cu:287: atra rāmasambandhādevāyamahaṅkāra ityato rāmasambandhabodhikāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāḥ tatpuruṣe lopāt rāmasambandhasya vidheyasāvimarśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:293: na khalu tasya kevalasya mukhyatā kintu rāmasambandhina ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:298: “yatra te patati subhru ! kaṭākṣaḥ ṣaṣṭhabāṇa iva pañcaśarasya” /
GK16visa07cu:301: (vi, pha) yathā veti---atra samudraparyyantatvasya vidheyasya samāse
GK16visa07cu:306: (lo, i) ṣaṣṭha iti--atra utprekṣāviṣayatvena vivakṣitasya ṣaṣṭapadasya tatpuruṣasamāse pūrvānikṣepo na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:314: tathā ca mocanābhāvasya evātra vidheyatvāt asamāsenaiva tathātvaṃ
GK16visa07cu:316: samāse tu tadbhannatvasya eva pratītyā paryyudāsatvameva tatra tu vidheyasya pratīṣedho na pratīyate itadyatastasyāvimarśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:322: jugopātmānamatrasta ityādau iva vidheḥ prādhānya yatra nāsti /
GK16visa07cu:323: navajaladhara ityādisamanantaroktodāharaṇavat yatra pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ kiyayā kaṇṭhoktayā adhyāhāryyayā vā astibhavatyādirūpayā paryyudāsatāpātātparyyudāsayogakṣemāpatteḥ /
GK16visa07cu:326: uktodāharaṇo tu tatpuruṣasamāse guṇībhāve nañaḥ paryudāsatayā niṣedhasya vidheyatayānavagamaḥ
GK16visa07cu:328: (vi, bha) asamāse eva nañarthasya vidheyatvarūpaṃ prādhānyaṃ,
GK16visa07cu:329: pratiyoginastvaprādhānyaṃ tādṛśasthale nañaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhatvam ityatra samvādamāha---aprādhānyamiti
GK16visa07cu:331: pratiṣedhe nañarthe 'samāsavaśāt pradhānatā, vidheyatā pratīyate iti
GK16visa07cu:333: tathātvaṃ kīdṛśaprayogamityatrāha---kriyayeti---na pacatītyādau ākhyātakriyayā saha samāsābhāvāt ; kriyayetyanena asamāsa eva lakṣyate /
GK16visa07cu:334: tathā ca asamāse yatra nañ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:335: ata evātra muktakriyayā nañaḥ sāhitye 'pi asamāsābhāvāt na prasajyapratiṣedhatā /
GK16visa07cu:338: amuktetyatra tu samāsāt na tathātvamityāha---uktodāharaṇe tviti /
GK16visa07cu:346: vidheyapratiyogibhūtābhāvasya pratiṣedhe naño 'pradhānatā samāsavaśāt apratīyamānavidheyatārūpāpradhānatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:349: pratiyogipadottarasthāne yatra naña ityarthe yatrottarapade, arthāt asamāsena paryyudāso jñeya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:350: na pacatītyatra uttaratra nañsattvāttu na paryyudāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:351: idamatrāvadheyam---pratiyogipadottaranañsattve samāsāsambhavāt yatrottaretyādinā samāsastha eva paryyudāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:352: anyathā na pacatītyatra, na dṛptaniśācara ityatra pūrvapatitasyāpi nañaḥ paryyudāsatvāt yatrottaretyādeḥ pralāpatvāpatteḥ /
GK16visa07cu:353: yadyapyasamāsasthasyāpi ghaṭo netyatra paryyudāsatvam asamāsasthasya kriyānvayinaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhatvamiti tu niyataṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:354: samāse kṛdantakriyānvayino 'pi paryyudāsatvāt asamasteti kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ samāse paryyudāsatvameva
GK16visa07cu:358: atrātrastatādyanūdyātmagopanādyeva vidheyamiti nañaḥ paryudāsatayā guṇībhāvo yuktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:360: (vi, ya) ityasya udāharaṇaṃ darśayati--jugopeti--evaṃ ca nañaḥ paryyudāsatve tadarthasya samāse vidheyatvāpratīteḥ ityāha /
GK16visa07cu:361: yukta ityatra vidhayasya nañarthasya avimarśa eveti sādhitam /
GK16visa07cu:368: ityatrāpi prasajyapratiṣedho bhavatīti ced ? na, atrāpi yadi bhojanādirūpakriyāṃśena nañaḥ sambandhaḥ syāttadaiva tatra prasajyapratiṣedhatvaṃ vaktuṃ śakyama, na ca tathā ; viśeṣyatayā pradhānena taddhojyārthena kartraṃśenaiva nañaḥ sambandhāt /
GK16visa07cu:373: yadi kriyāṃśe nañaḥ sambandhaḥ syāt tadaiva prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ syāt “kiyayā saha yatra naña”iti vacanāt /
GK16visa07cu:374: iha tu śrāddhabojanaśīlādayamanya iti kartraṃśenaiva sambandhāt nañaḥ paryyudāsatvameveti
GK16visa07cu:382: prasajyapratiṣedharūpayoḥ śrāddhabhojanābhāvasūryyadarśanābhāvayoḥ pratītidarśanāt tad dṛṣṭāntena amuktetyatrāpi mocanābhāvarūpasya pratiṣedhasya vidheyasya vidheyatvāpattimāśaṅkate---nanviti samādhatte, cenneti /
GK16visa07cu:384: akṣoddhetyanayorapi yadi bhajanadarśanakriyayornañarthasyānvayaḥ syāt tadaiva tathātvāpādanaṃ sambhavati /
GK16visa07cu:385: tayoranvaya eva tatra netyāha--- na ca tatheti /
GK16visa07cu:387: karttari vihitābhyāṃ kṛtpratyayābhyāmupasthāpitena bhojirūpakartraṃśena ca sahaiva naño nañarthasya sambandhāt ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:390: kṛtpratyayena kartrupasthānāt śrāddhabhojī ityatra bhojanakarttaiva pratīyate ityatra samvādamāha--yadāhuḥ--śrāddhabhojaneti
GK16visa07cu:391: atra kṛtpratyayādevaṃ darśanakarttāro rājadārā api pratīyante ityapi bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:392: tathā ca tayorapi śrāddhabhojibhinnasūryyadarśakabhinnatvam ityevaṃ paryyudāsa eva pratīyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:393: tathā ca samāsasthatannañ--dṛṣṭāntenāpyamuktā ityatra samāsasthanañaḥ paryyudāsatvameva sidhyatīti manasikṛtya amuktetyatra bhojītyataḥ kiñcinmātraṃ valakṣaṇyaṃ darśayati /
GK16visa07cu:399: iha tu bhāṣyakārādimatamāśritya kiyānvayāṃśāpekṣayā prasajyapratiṣedhārthasvīkāre 'pi amuktetyādau
GK16visa07cu:401: “amuktā” ityatra tu kriyayaiva saha saṃbandha iti doṣa eva /
GK16visa07cu:407: na pacati na nidrāti ityanvaye kartturupasthāne 'pi
GK16visa07cu:408: nidrāpākakṛtyorevānvayāt atha niyamābhāve 'pi tātparyyavaśāt tatra karttaryyeva nañarthānvaya iti cenna /
GK16visa07cu:410: śrāddhābhojanaśīlānvaye tu śrāddhabhojanaśīlabhinna iti pratītau na kadacit bhojanakṛt api pratīyate ityato granthakṛtānavadhānādeva itthaṃ samādhānaṃ kṛtam /
GK16visa07cu:411: vayaṃ tu tātparyyavaśāt śrāddhapadaṃ śrāddhamātraparaṃ, tatreva ca nañarthānvayaḥ, tathā ca śrāddhamātrabhojītyarthalābhe mātrārthavaśāt śrāddhabhojanaśīlalābha iti brūmaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:412: ete ca kliṣṭatvādayaḥ samāsagatā eva padadoṣāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:416: samāsagatā eveti natu asamāse 'pi padadoṣā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:418: anāsattyadhīnakliṣṭatve tu samāsasya evāsambhavāt padagatatvaṃ nāsti
GK16visa07cu:419: viruddhamatikṛtaḥ padārthantarānvayenaiva duṣṭatvāt avimṛṣṭavidheyāṃśasya cānuvādyavidheyārthakapadadvayaghaṭitatvāt vā samāsaṃ vinā padatvāsambhavāt /
GK16visa07cu:422: (vi, śa) eṣāṃ trayodaśānāṃ padagatatvaṃ darśayitvā vākyagataṃ tu
GK16visa07cu:428: ataḥ śrutikaṭvādīnāṃ kvacit padāṃśaniṣṭatve 'pi bahuvyāpitvena vākyagatatvaṃ boddhavyam /
GK16visa07cu:441: atra pravṛttiśabdasya purīṣavyañjanayā, vāntaśabdasya ca udrīrṇavācakatayā jugupsā /
GK16visa07cu:444: atra kalalalauhityaṃ padmarāgaḥ, vakrābhirvāmābhiḥ, iti neyārthatā /
GK16visa07cu:449: karaṇabhūtaiḥ, vakrābhiḥ vāmābhiḥ strībhiḥ kartttrobhistanurbhūṣitā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:452: lakṣitena padena ca padmarāgamaṇirucyate ityarthaḥ na ca pratyayānāṃ kṛtyarthānvitasvārthabodhakatvāt kathamatra tṛtīyayā padmārage karaṇatā bodhyate iti vācyam , īdṛśasthale prakṛtyarthe 'pi tat svīkārāt /
GK16visa07cu:455: vastutastu vāmāvakrāpadayoḥ paryyāyaikyadarśanasya śaktibhramabījasya sattvāt atra avācakatvameva yuktam /
GK16visa07cu:458: atra dhammillasya śobhāṃ prekṣya kasya mānasaṃ na sajyatīti saṃbandhaḥ kliṣṭaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:465: atra cāyameva nyakkāra iti nyakkārasya vidheyatvaṃ vivakṣitam /
GK16visa07cu:472: anuvādyamanuktvaiva na vidhayamudīrayet iti niyamāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:473: ata eva vahnimān parvata iti na prayujyate /
GK16visa07cu:474: nanu vidheyapadasya pūrvanipātena doṣe padadoṣatvameva ucitamityata
GK16visa07cu:477: (lo, e) nyakkāra iti--ayamāśayaḥ, tatra dharmmiṇamuddiśya sādyadharmmovidhīyate ityanusāreṇa prathamamanūdya vidheyo nyakkāraḥ paścānnirddiṣṭumucitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:479: ata eva śabdo 'nitya iti vaktavye 'nityaḥ śabda iti vacanena ca prāptaṃ nigrahasthānamāhuḥ
GK16visa07cu:480: tathā hi kathamatra vākyadoṣa ityata āha---racaneti /
GK16visa07cu:481: padadvayasya viparītatāyāmeveti padaṃ nirddiśya paścānnyakkāra iti padasya ca paścānnirddeśyasya prathamanirddeśāt /
GK16visa07cu:483: vṛthocchūnairityatrāpi avasthānasattve pūrvamatra padadoṣatvamudāhṛtaṃ tatra nyakkāra ityādyanapekṣā granthagauravabhayāt /
GK16visa07cu:486: nirākāṅkṣatvapratipattaye tacchabdasamānārthatayā pratipādyamānā idametadaḥ śabdā vidheyā eva bhavituṃ yuktāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:489: ya ānandayati asau samāgata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:491: yacchabdasya nirākāṅkṣatvapratipattaye pratipadyamānā idametadadaḥ śabdāḥ ityanena teṣāṃ sarvatra tacchabdābhidhānamiti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:494: vinā doṣāsaṅgaṃ satataparipūrṇākhilakalaḥ kutaḥ prāptaścandro vigalitakalaṅkaḥ sumukhai ! te” //
GK16visa07cu:503: “yaḥ sa te nayanānandakaraḥ subhru ! sa āgataḥ” /
GK16visa07cu:505: (vi, ga) vidheyārthakasyādaḥ śabdasya uddeśyārthakāt yacchabdāt paranipāte 'pi sānnidhyavaśāt vidheyatvāpratītyā etaddeṣamudāharati---āvandayatīti /
GK16visa07cu:506: atra yaste netre ānandayati asau samāgata iti bodhe yacchabdārthe
GK16visa07cu:507: 'nuvādyo 'daḥ śabdārtho vidheyaḥ, tasyāvimarśaṃ grāhayitum adaḥ śabdasya vidheyataucityaṃ darśayati---yattadoriti /
GK16visa07cu:513: tathā ca tacchabda iva idametadadaḥ śabdā api ākāṅkṣāpūrakatvena vidheyārthakatayauva vidheyā bhavituṃ yuktā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:520: yaḥ sa te iti yaḥ prasiddha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:524: tathā sati teṣāṃ vidheyatvaṃ sphuṭamavagamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:530: nirākāṅkṣatvagamakasyaiva ca vidheyatvāpratītiviṣayatvamityatastato nāvimarśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:543: “yaṃ sarvaśailāḥ parikalpya vatsaṃ merau sthite dogdhari dohadakṣe /
GK16visa07cu:547: ekasyaivopādāne tu nāyaṃ vicāra ityāha---yatra ca yattadoriti /
GK16visa07cu:552: yatpāpamarthāt svaniṣṭaṃ tadātmā jānāti ityarthaḥ--evaṃ yaṃ sarveti /
GK16visa07cu:554: na cātra kathamuttarasthatvam iti vācyam, kulakatvena tatpūrvavākyārthatatpadena sāha'syānvayāt tadvākyottaravākyasthatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:562: (vi, ca) yattadornityasākāṅśratvena tacchabdamātropādāne yacchabdasyārthatvaṃ prasaṅgāddarśayati---tacchabdasya iti /
GK16visa07cu:566: kriyate tathā vālikāryam api sugrīveṇa karttavyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:573: sa ityanena yaḥ prakṛto rāmacandraḥ sa iti /
GK16visa07cu:574: tatra sa ityanena yaḥ sakalalokaprasiddhaḥ sarvajñātvādiguṇāviśiṣṭaḥ tādātmyāyātmana ekābhāvāpattaye
GK16visa07cu:575: tāṃ yā tadguṇaviśiṣṭatayā anubhūtetyādiṣu yada ārthatvam /
GK16visa07cu:576: yatra ca yacchabdanikaṭasthitānāmapīdamādiśabdānāṃ bhinnaliṅgavibhaktitvaṃ tatrāpi nirākāṅkṣatvameva
GK16visa07cu:582: yatra ya ādhārastadadhikāraṇamityatra iva idaṃ pade vidheyasya
GK16visa07cu:585: yaḥ indurvibhāti tena pathikayoṣito dagdhā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:593: “na me śamayitā ko 'pi mārasyetyuvi ! mā śucaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:595: atra yo 'sti, sa te bhārasya śamayiteti budhyate /
GK16visa07cu:599: he urvi ! me bhārasya śamayitā ko 'pi na, evaṃ mā śucaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:603: vyākhyātaṃ ca tacchabdārthāvagamaṃ vināpi yathoktabālakasattvasya yata iti uttaravākyagatatayā kāraṇahetutvāvagamād uttaravākyagatayacchabdasya tacchabdānapekṣaṇāt /
GK16visa07cu:604: kintu--- “ye nāma kecidiha naḥ prathayantyavajñāṃ jānanti te kimapi tān prati naiṣa yatnaḥ
GK16visa07cu:605: utpatsyate 'sti mama ko 'pi samānadharmā kālo hyayaṃ niravadhirvipulā ca pṛthvī //
GK16visa07cu:606: iti yo bhavabhūterahaṅkāraślokaḥ kāvyaprakāśakṛtā yattadordvayoranupādānodāharaṇaṃ darśitaṃ tadevodāharaṇaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:607: tatra utpatsyamānasya dharmiṇo viśeṣyāniścitatvāt yattadbhyāṃ sāmānyata eva ya utpatsyate taṃ prati yatna ityuktaucityāt /
GK16visa07cu:609: ityatraiko yacchabdaḥ sākāṅkṣa iti na vācyam, tathāhi---yadyadityanena
GK16visa07cu:616: tathāpi vīpsitayacchabdasthale ekayatpadākāṅkṣaiva ekatatpadena nivarttatām anyad yatpadaṃ tu sākāṅkṣamevasyāt /
GK16visa07cu:617: tathā ca---yad yad virahaduḥ khaṃ me tadityatra ekaṃ yatpadaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃsyāt ityāśaṅkya samādhatte--iti na vācyamiti /
GK16visa07cu:619: yena kenacit ityasyāyamabhiprāyo vīpsayā tāvat samastā vyaktaya upasthāpyante /
GK16visa07cu:620: tā vyaktaya eva tatpadena ca parāmarśa yadi vaktustātparyyaṃ tadā ekatatpadenaiva samastavyaktipāramarśāt yatpadadvayākāṅ kṣāpūraṇāt na tatpade vīpsā /
GK16visa07cu:624: yadi vīpsitayatpadadvayena tadvyaktitvena eva upasthāpayituṃ vakātustātparyyaṃ tadā bhavatyeva tatpade 'pi vīpsā /
GK16visa07cu:625: yathā “yaṃ yaṃ vyatīyāya patiṃ varā sā vivarṇabhāvaṃ sa sa bhūmipālaḥ
GK16visa07cu:626: “ityatra “yāṃ yāṃ priyaḥ praikṣata kātarakṣīṃ sā sā hriyā namraṃmukī babhūta /
GK16visa07cu:632: tatra aprayuktasya vākyagatatve yathā--”sa pātu vo duścyavano
GK16visa07cu:638: atra padadoṣānantaraṃ padāṃśadoṣāṇām uddeśyakamaprāptatve yeṣāṃ vākyadoṣāṇāṃ padadoṣasajātīyatvena prathamaṃ kathanaṃ, “nyakkāro
GK16visa07cu:639: hyayameva”ityādeśca padadoṣajātīyatve 'pi avimṛṣṭavidheyāṃśasya viśeṣatvenaitat prastāva evodāharaṇam
GK16visa07cu:645: (vi, ña) tadgaccha siddhyai kuru devakāryyamityatra iti śrutikaṭuḥ /
GK16visa07cu:653: anirddiṣṭakālakāḥ pratyayāḥ triṣvapi kāleṣu bhavantītyanusāsanāt traikālikakriyāsveva tasya sādhutvāt /
GK16visa07cu:655: kintu lakṣaṇīya eva sā lakṣaṇā na neyārthā /
GK16visa07cu:658: (lo, u) vijeya ityanena vijetuṃ śakya eva pratipādyate natu vijitatvam /
GK16visa07cu:664: atra vacaḥ śabdasya gīḥ śabdavācakatve neyārthātvam /
GK16visa07cu:669: na gīrvacaḥ śabdayordvayorapi vācyavācakatvena vākyabāṇatvarūpayogārthena devārthe kathaṃ śabdalakṣaṇeti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:670: bāṇaśabdapūrvavarttino gīḥ śabdasya parivṛttyakṣamatvāt vacobāṇaśabdena devābodhanāt /
GK16visa07cu:672: śaktisattvādeva naca deve lakṣaṇā kintu gīḥ śabdabodhasya
GK16visa07cu:674: na caivaṃ gīḥ śabdo vāṇatvameva pratyetumucitam, na vākyabāṇatvamiti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:675: lakṣitagīḥ śabdenaikavākyabodhanāt tathā pratītiriti prapañcitamidamasmatkṛtakāvyaprakāśaṭīkāyāṃ vastravaidūryacaraṇairiti neyārthodāharaṇe /
GK16visa07cu:680: (vi, ḍa) śareti pāṭha iti---tathā ca gīḥ śara iti na bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:685: tathā ca jalāśaya iti samudratvena rūpaemābodhakam /
GK16visa07cu:691: baḍaveti tenāśvānala iti na bhavati baḍavāgniriti tu bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:693: (lo, ṛ) vacaṛ śabdasyeti---atra vacobāṇaśabdena gīrvāṇo vivakṣitaḥ
GK16visa07cu:698: nirarthakatvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ ca padamātragatatvenaila lakṣye saṃbhavaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:702: tathāvidhadoṣāvahaṃ hi ko nāma mūḍhaḥ punaḥ punarabhidadhyāt /
GK16visa07cu:707: atra hantīti gamanārthe paṭhitamapi na tatra samartham /
GK16visa07cu:710: śaktisattve 'pi jaṅghāpaddhatirityādau pratyayaviśeṣopapadaviśeṣasahakāreṇaiva gatismāraṇasamarthaṃ na svata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:711: punaḥ punaḥ gamyate, padbhyāṃ gamyate, iti hi jaṅghāpaddhatipadayorvyutpattiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:718: kanakaśilānibhaṃ kirātamūrttestrilocanasya vakṣo bhujābhyām ājaghne ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:723: nanvatra “ājadhne” iti padasya svato na duṣṭatā, api tu padāntarāpekṣayaiva ityasya vākyadoṣatā ? maivam /
GK16visa07cu:733: tathā yathehātmanepadasya parivṛttāvapi na padadoṣaḥ, tathā hanprakṛterapīti na padāṃśadoṣaḥ
GK16visa07cu:735: (lo, e) ājaghna ityatra na sakalasya padasya parivṛttyasahanam /
GK16visa07cu:737: tathā hi ājaghāna ityukte hanaprakṛtisadbhāve 'pi doṣasyābhāva ityāśaṅkya āha---yathāheti
GK16visa07cu:746: svamate tu mādhuryaujaḥ prasādākhyāstraya eva guṇāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:748: ājaghne iti padasya doṣaśva padamātragāmīti darśayati---iha tviti /
GK16visa07cu:749: tasyānvayavāyatirekānuvidhāyitvaṃ tu tadarthakasya ājaghāna ityasya prajahāretyasya ca dānena doṣābhāvāt /
GK16visa07cu:753: evaṃ handhātūttarātmanepadasya doṣatāprayojakānvayādyanuvidhānaṃ darśayitvā tasya padaikadoṣatāprasaktivāraṇāya ātmanepadapūrvavarttihandhātorapi tathātvamāha---yathehetyādi na padadoṣa iti /
GK16visa07cu:761: ādatte iti avācakapadasya śrutikaṭupadāderapi evaṃ nyāyāt padadoṣatetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:763: tathāhi----yadi uktanyāyāt aprayuktatvādyanekadoṣāṇāmapi padamātradoṣatvamuktaṃ tatkathaṃ smārārttyandhaḥ ityādiṣu teṣāṃ vākyagatatvamudāhṛtam /
GK16visa07cu:766: atha teṣāmekavākyasthānekapadāvalambitvād vākyadoṣatā udāhṛtā iti cet tadā padamātradoṣatāprayojakatayā darśitanyāyakathanasya pramattagītataiva
GK16visa07cu:777: deṣāḥ kecit ityādikārikāvākyasya kākākṣi(golaka) nyāyena nirarthaka ityādivākye sambandhaḥ
GK16visa07cu:778: tena nirarthakatva yathā--- “payasāṃ pravāha iva saurasaindhavaḥ”atra
GK16visa07cu:784: nanu “kuñjaṃ hanti kṛśodarī”ityatra han prakṛtereva parivṛttayasahatvādasagarthasya padāṃśaniṣṭatvameva
GK16visa07cu:786: atrocyate asamarthatvasya pṛthak padaniṣṭatvasya prāyeṇādarśanāt prakṛtipratyayau hi svārthabodhakau
GK16visa07cu:787: ityanādṛtya samuditaṃ padaṃ vācakamiti matamālambya intītyatra padaniṣṭatvamevoktam /
GK16visa07cu:788: ata eva kāvyaprakāśakṛtāpi-- apāsya cyutasaṃskāramasamarthaṃ nirarthakam /
GK16visa07cu:807: (lo, o) sarvathā prayogābhāvaḥ ata eva vākyadoṣamadhye 'gaṇanam /
GK16visa07cu:817: avākacatve dinādayaḥ prakāśamayādyarthe, na tatheti parasparabhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:827: evaṃ padadoṣasajātīyā vākyadoṣā uktāḥ, samprati tadvijātīyā ucyante---
GK16visa07cu:830: pade yo doṣaḥ vākye 'pi tādṛśadoṣasya sattvāt---tatsajātīyatā;
GK16visa07cu:833: (lo, a) samprati vakṣyamāṇānāṃ vākyadoṣāṇāṃ samanantarebhyo bhedadarśikāṃ kārikāmāha--evamiti
GK16visa07cu:834: padadoṣāṇāṃ sajātīyāḥ śrutikaṭvādaya ubhayatra varttamānatvād vākyamātragāḥ na punaḥ śrutikaṭvādivat padatadaṃśavākyagāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:851: “ovaṭṭai ullaṭṭai saaṇo kahiṃpi moṭṭāai ṇo parihaṭṭai /
GK16visa07cu:852: hiaeṇa phiṭṭai lajjāi khuṭṭai dihīe sā” //
GK16visa07cu:853: atra ṭakārāḥ śṛṅgārasaparipanthinaḥ kevalaṃ śaktipradarśanāya nibaddhāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:854: eṣāṃ caikadvitricatuḥ prayoge na tādṛśagrasabhaṅga iti na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:856: (vi, ba) ovaṭṭa iti---avaluṭhati ulluṭhati, luṭhati, śayane kadāpi /
GK16visa07cu:857: muñcati no parihasati hṛdaye enaṃ paśyati, lajjayā khidyati /
GK16visa07cu:863: lajjayā paśyati ca diśi diśi khidyati ca ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:869: ovaṭṭai iti---saṃskṛtacchāyā---”apavarttata udvarttate parivarttate śayane kasminnapi /
GK16visa07cu:870: ramate no vilulitahṛdaye bhraśyati lajjayā truṭyati dhṛtau sā” //
GK16visa07cu:875: ata eva tathāvidhānāṃ bahuvāraprayoge padadoṣasajātīyo vākyadoṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:889: āhateti---asya tu bahuśaḥ pāta eva doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:891: (lo, i) evaṃ ḷuptāhataprayogayorapi sakṛdeva prayoge na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:911: kecittvāhuḥ---yatra viśeṣaṇasyāpi kriyāviśeṣaṇatvaṃ sambhavati tatrāpi tatprayogo na ghaṭate
GK16visa07cu:918: tadāha---kecittviti---atrāpi na yujyata iti prakāśābhiprāyamabuddhvā likhitaṃ vācprayogastu upapattyantarāsattvād yujyata eva /
GK16visa07cu:919: kintu viśeṣaṇadānārthaṃ tatprayoga ityuktireva viśeṣaṇasya kriyāviśeṣaṇasambhavoktyā dūṣitā na tu vācamityasya prayogaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:924: tadupapattistu yathā---vacerdvidhā vuyatpattiḥ kaṇṭhatālvādyabhighātaḥ tajjanyaṃ vacanaṃ cārthaḥ
GK16visa07cu:925: tatra vacanārthakatayā prayoge vācamiti na prayujyate /
GK16visa07cu:926: kaṇṭhatālvādyabhighātārthakatayā prayoge tu tatkarmabhūtasya vācamityasya yujyata eva prayoga iti /
GK16visa07cu:937: (vi, ra) nyūnapadatvamāha---yadi mayīti---mama indratayā indratvena tadā kimityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:940: nūnaṃ prastutakāvyapratipādakasya cāsaṃmukhīnasya mahātmana eveti dṛṣṭipātena vakturabhiṣṭapūraṇamiti
GK16visa07cu:941: tasyānirddeśena yasya kasyacidapi dṛṣṭapātasūcanena tatpratyāyanamantharamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:945: atra visaśabdasya dhṛtaparisphuṭatatprasūnā iti sarvanāmnaiva parāmarśo yuktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:956: dhṛtavikāśitatkāḥ sainyāḥ senāsamavetajanāḥ visaṃ mṛṇālaṃ jakṣuḥ bubhujire /
GK16visa07cu:972: idaṃ vṛttamiti dodhakaṃ nāma vṛttaṃ chanda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:980: yatpādānte laghorapi gurubhāvaḥ uktaḥ, tatsarvatra dvitīyacaturthapādaviṣayam /
GK16visa07cu:982: atra”pramuditasaurabha āgato vasantaḥ” iti pāṭho yuktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:985: kīdṛśaḥ vikasitasahakārabhārasya hārī manohārī parimola yatra tādṛśaḥ
GK16visa07cu:992: “anyāstā guṇaratnarohaṇabhuvo dhanyā mṛdanyaiva sā sambhārāḥ khalu te 'nya
GK16visa07cu:994: śrīmatkāntijuṣāṃ dviṣāṃ karatalāt strīṇāṃ nigtabasthalāt dṛṣṭe yatra patanti mūḍhamanasāmastrāṇi vastrāṇi ca” //
GK16visa07cu:997: ratnarohaṇabhuvaḥ prasiddhā eva, guṇaratnarohaṇabhuvastvanyā vilakṣaṇā eva /
GK16visa07cu:998: evaṃ dhanyā mṛdanyaiva, evaṃ sambhārā api khalvanye /
GK16visa07cu:999: evaṃ yairarthāt yadguṇaratnamṛdviśeṣasahitaiḥ sambhāraireṣa yuvā vidhinā sṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1000: yatra yūni dṛṣṭe sati mūḍhamanasāṃ dviṣāṃ karatalādastrāṇi mūḍhamanasāṃ strīṇāṃ nitambasthalād vastrāṇi ca patanti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1011: “vastrāṇyapi” iti pāṭhe tu dārḍhyamiti na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1032: projjvalataḥ jvalanasya jvālāvat vikaṭā sundarī urusaṭānāṃ chaṭā kāntiryasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1033: śvāsenākṣiptāḥ pātitāḥ kulakṣmābhṛtaḥ kulācalā yena tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1043: (lo, ai) bhātīndurityanayorvṛttopagatatvena sandhairna kṛtaḥ, tacca mahākavisamayaviruddham
GK16visa07cu:1058: (lo, o) marvante--marorante asau urvo iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1061: jaganmā kuru tanvaṅgi ! mānaṃ pādānate priye” //
GK16visa07cu:1069: tṛtīyapāde viśeṣasya kriyānvayena vākyārthasamāptāvapi anākaṅkṣitaviśeṣaṇānvayārthaṃ viśeṣasyāvṛttirūpo 'tra doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1070: atra hi dhvāntanāśanenaiva kṣamātalabhāsanaprāptau tadviśeṣaṇam anākaṅkṣitam /
GK16visa07cu:1071: yatra tu viśeṣaṇe ākāṅkṣā tiṣṭhati tatra nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1073: '; ityatra pramāṇādhikatvaviśeṣaṇaṃ vinā prakṛtaśvāsena stanevapathvajananāt śvāsasya pramāṇādhikatva ākāṅkṣā /
GK16visa07cu:1079: yāmeṇākṣīṃ vinā prāṇā viphalā me kuto 'dya sā” //
GK16visa07cu:1080: atra yacchabdaniddiṣṭanāṃ vākyānāṃ parasparanirapekṣatvāt tadekāntaḥ pātinā eṇākṣīśabdena anyeṣāṃ sambandhaḥ kaverabhimato nopapadyata eva /
GK16visa07cu:1087: yayā eṇākṣyā ityevameṇākṣīviśeṣyako 'nvayaḥ kaverabhipretaḥ sa ca na sambhavati /
GK16visa07cu:1088: dvitīyāntapadārthasya, yā, yayeti prathamāntatṛtīyāntayatpadārthayoḥ abhedena viśeṣyabhāvāpyutpatteriti pratipādayitumāha---atreti /
GK16visa07cu:1093: tathā ca eṇākṣyāmeva sākāṅkṣatvāt tadviśeṣyaka eva /
GK16visa07cu:1094: yā yayetyānayorarthānvayaḥ kaverabhimataḥ sa ca na
GK16visa07cu:1097: ekaṃ yatpadaṃ tadantaḥ pātinā tadarthānvayinā eṇākṣīśabdena eṇākṣīśabdārthena ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1098: anyeṣāṃ yā yayeti yacchabdārthānāṃ dvayorapyatra bahutvāropād bahuvacanam /
GK16visa07cu:1099: na cātra eṇākṣīmitipadasya vibhaktivyatyayena yā yayetyanayoranvaya iti bācyam, avyatyayena prathamamanvitasyaiva vyatyayavyutpatteḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1103: abhavan, matam, iṣṭam, arthāt kaveḥ yogaḥ sambandho yatra /
GK16visa07cu:1107: “yāṃ vināmī vṛthā prāṇā eṇākṣī sā kṛto 'dya me” /
GK16visa07cu:1108: iti tacchabdanirdiṣṭavākyāntaḥ pātitve 'pi yacchabdaniddiṣṭavākyaiḥ sambandho ghaṭate /
GK16visa07cu:1110: (vi, gha) yadi tu tacchabdārthasya viśeṣyatayā eṇākṣīśabdaḥ prayujyate tadādoṣa ityāha---yāṃ vinā me vṛthā iti /
GK16visa07cu:1113: na ca tathāpiṃ bhinnavibhaktikayattatpadārthayoḥ kathamabhedānvaya iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:1116: yathā yatra dhūmaḥ sa deśo vāhnimān ityatra tatpadārthānvitasya prathamāntapadārthasya deśasya saptamyantayatpadārthe 'nvayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1124: atra yadityasya tadetyanena sambandho na ghaṭate /
GK16visa07cu:1133: tathā ca yadi kaṭākṣeṇa īkṣase tadā tena kaṭākṣeṇa manobhavaḥ dhanvī ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1137: atra vyomakāsāraśabdasya samāse guṇībhāvāttadarthasya na sarvaiḥ saṃyogaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1142: atreti---kāsāre rājahaṃsa ityevaṃśamāse tatpuruṣe uttarapadārthasya viśeṣyatvāt kāsāraśabdārthasya viśeṣaṇībhāva eva guṇībhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1144: nirākāḍkṣatvāt, tathā ca tasya payaḥ pūrādau viśeṣaṇībhāvena
GK16visa07cu:1147: ata eva caitrasya dāsabhāryyā ityatra bhāryyāyaṃ viśeṣaṇasya dāsasya caitraviśeṣyābhāvenānvaye sākāṅkṣataiva /
GK16visa07cu:1151: iha tu pradhānasya kāsārapadārthasya prādhānyenāpratīteḥ sarvo 'pi payaḥ pūrādiśabdārthastadaṅgatayā na pratīyata iti sarvavākyārthavirodhāvabhāsa
GK16visa07cu:1157: kintu vidheyasya vidheyatvāpratītyā yadeva vidheyamavimṛṣṭaṃ tadeva duṣṭamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1159: uddeśyasambandhitayā vidheyatvāpratītyā uddeśyaghaṭitavākyasyānvayavyatirekād vākyadoṣatvād duṣṭaṃ tu vidheyapadamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1186: bhārgavasyādhikanindā kartaro adhikaṃ vaidagdhyaṃ dyotayati ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1188: samaya eva karoti bālabalaṃ praṇigadanta itīva śarīriṇām /
GK16visa07cu:1190: atra parāmṛśyamānavākyānantarameveti śabdopayogo yujyate, na tu “praṇigadanta” ityanantaram
GK16visa07cu:1193: (vi, jha) akramateti--avyavadhānena taduttarapātaniyamenaiva tatparāmarśakasya śabdasya tatparāmarśārthamanyottarapātastattvam
GK16visa07cu:1195: paruṣīkṛtāḥ duḥ śravīkṛtāḥ svarā yeṣāṃ tādṛśa mayūrā yatra kriyāyāṃ tādṛśaṃ yathā syāttathā śaradiṃ haṃsaravā ramaṇīyatām ayuḥ prāptavantaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1196: kīdṛśāḥ ? śarīriṇāṃ balābalaṃ samaya eva karotīti vinigadantaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1198: mayūraravāpekṣayā haṃsaravāṇāmapakṛṣṭatve 'pi śaradiṃ haṃsaravāṇāṃ paruṣīkaraṇāt samayena svarāṇāṃ balābalakaraṇāt śarīriṇāmapi balābalalābha
GK16visa07cu:1201: atra ca śarīriṇāmapibalābalam iti anvaye kliṣṭatāpi bodhyā /
GK16visa07cu:1204: evaṃ sati praṇigadanta iti padasyāpi anuvādyavākyapraveśaśaṅketyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1206: kalā ca sā kāntimatī kalāvatastvamasya lokasya ca netrakaumudī” //
GK16visa07cu:1209: (vi, ña) dūyaṃ gataṃ samprati śocanīyatāmiti---tapasyantīṃ pārvatīṃ pratijaṭilaveśasya śivasya svanindāvākyamidam /
GK16visa07cu:1210: candrakalā eva prāk śocanīyā āsīt saṃprati tu tavāpi tathātvād dvayamiti /
GK16visa07cu:1211: nindrāpratipādanārthaṃ kapālavattvakathanaṃ kalāyāḥ prārthanā ca tatsamāgamādanumeyā /
GK16visa07cu:1218: rāmamanmatheti--sā niśācarī rākṣasī tāḍakā eva niśācarī abhisārikā
GK16visa07cu:1219: rāmasya eva manmathasya kandarpasyaiva duḥ sahena śareṇa hṛdaye tāḍitā satī durgandhavad rudhiraṇaiva gandhadravyayuktaraktacandanaiva ukṣitā jīviteśasya yamasyaiva jīviteśasya prāṇeśasya upanāyakasya vasatiṃ gatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1223: (lo, u) jīviteśo yamaḥ prāṇeśaśca prakṛto rasaḥ bībhatsaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1228: (vi, ṭha) vācyasyānabhidhānamiti---vācyam avaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ tasyoccāraṇenādhyāhāreṇa ca anabhidhānamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1232: atra tu vyatikramalavamapīti apikārādhyāhareṇāpi na vivakṣitasiddhiḥ
GK16visa07cu:1234: samāse tadā vyatikramalavaṃ padārthantaramapītyevamva bodhodayādato 'troccāraṇenādhyāhāreṇāvaśyaṃ vācyasyānabhidhānam /
GK16visa07cu:1235: nyūnapadatve vācakapadasyaiva nyūnatā vivakṣitā, apestu na tathātvamityanayorbhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1240: atra tu na tathā adhyāhārasambhava ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1246: (vi, ḍha) caraṇanateti---he caṇḍi ! kopane ! caraṇe ānataḥ kāntaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1250: yadyapīti nirākāṅkṣam eva sambaddhaṃ bhavati tathāpīti tatra dvitīyavākyagatatve eva upapadyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1254: iha tu ṅasantaṃ padaṃ vihāyāsīti padaniveśanena ityanayorbhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1257: atra vacadhātunā prakrāntaṃ prativacanamapi tenaiva vaktumucitam /
GK16visa07cu:1259: evaṃ ca sati na kathitapadatvadoṣaḥ, tasyoddeśyavyatiriktaviṣayakatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:1264: atra vacdhātunā uddeśye prativacane 'pi vacdhātunāpi ākāṅkṣā iti
GK16visa07cu:1267: nirasyatievamiti---tasyoddeśyeti--uddeśye pratinirdeśyatā anekavidhāḥ tatra vidhyatayā nirdeśyasya dharmasyaiva punarvidheyatayā ākāṅkṣitasya
GK16visa07cu:1269: yathatraiva śloke rāvaṇe vidheyatayā nirdiṣṭasya vacanasya prativacanatvena vidheyatayā pratinirdeśaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1270: yathā vā--- udeti savitā tāmrastāmra evāstameti ca /
GK16visa07cu:1272: ityatra ekarūpatākathanād udyatsavitari vidheyatayā nirdiṣṭasya tāmratvasya astasavitaryyapi vidhayatayā pratinirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1273: (2) ekoddeśena vidhyasya vidheyāntare uddeśyatayā pratinirdeśa ityaparā /
GK16visa07cu:1275: vinayādavāpyate'; ityatra jitendriyatvena vidheyasya vinayakāraṇatvasya śarīrapraviṣṭatayā vidheyasya vinayasya guṇaprakarṣavidhau uddeśyatayā
GK16visa07cu:1278: yathā--te himālayamāmantrya punaḥ prekṣya ca śūlinam /
GK16visa07cu:1280: ityatra siddhārthanivedanavidhau uddiṣṭasya tatraiva vidheye uddeśyatayā punaḥ pratinirdeśa ityaparā /
GK16visa07cu:1291: ityatra hi yadi padāntareṇa sa evārthaḥ pratipādyate tadānyor'tha iva pratibhāsamānaḥ pratītiṃ sthagayati /
GK16visa07cu:1296: anyor'tha iveti nāviśiṣṭasyaiva nāmino bodha iti mate
GK16visa07cu:1301: tathā ca sati rasānubhavavighna iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1305: atra “asmai” itīdamā prakrāntasya tenaiva tatsamānābhyāmetadaḥ śabdābhyāṃ vā parāmarśo yukto na tacchabdena /
GK16visa07cu:1314: na caivaṃ tatpadenāpi sarvanāmnā tathaiva parāmarśādadoṣa iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:1315: tattu atra asmaiva iti idam śabdena buddhisthapurovarttitayā mahādevaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1316: tacchabdena viprakṛṣṭaparāmarśitayā tasya parāmarśaḥ kartuṃ na śakyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1319: atra “mitā bhūḥ patyāpāṃ sa ca patirapām” iti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1323: bhūḥ udanvacchinnā sa cāpāṃ patiḥ yojanaśataṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhatīti śeṣaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1324: atra bhuvamuddiśya udanvacchinnatve vidheye udanvānapi vidheyaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1325: tasya yojanaśatavyāptividhau uddeśyatayā apāṃpatiśabdena pratinirdeśaḥ kṛta iti doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1333: (vi, dha) evavidheye uddiṣṭasya tatraiva vidheye uddeśyatayā pratinirdeśasya pratyayārthasya kramabhaṅgamudāharati---yaśo 'dhigantumiti
GK16visa07cu:1336: manuṣyasaṃkhyātivarttanasya vecchayā nirutsukānāmutkaṇṭhārahitānāmatha ca tadanukūlaceṣṭārūpābhiyogabhājāmaṅkaṃ siddhiḥ samutsukeva utkaṇṭhiteva upaitītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1337: atra nirusukavidhāvuddiṣṭāyā icchāyāstatraiva nirutsukatvavidhau uddeśyatayā pratinirdeśaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1357: ghora iti---sambandhaiviśeṣe eva śabdaviśeṣāṇāṃ prayoga ityatra
GK16visa07cu:1368: tvamasya lokasya ca ityatra tu uttarapaṭhitaniyatapadasya tathātvamatra tu tanniyamarahitapadasyeti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1369: tīrthe tadīye iti---asya rājño gajaiḥ setubandhāt pratīpagāṃ gaṅgam uttarato tadīye gāṅgīye tīrthe uttaradiśi nabholaṅghanalolapakṣā haṃsā ayatnabālavyajanībabhūvurityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1370: setubandhena jalavṛddhyā prāvṛṭkālabuddhyā uttaradiśi mānasarovaragamanārthaṃ haṃsā uḍḍīnā iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1375: (lo, e) tadīya ityasya pūrvaṃ gaṅgāmityasya pāṭho yuktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1379: atra saṃśṛṇuta ityataḥ pūrvaṃ nañaḥ sthitirucitā /
GK16visa07cu:1380: atra ca padamātrasyāsthāne niveśe 'pi sarvameva vākyaṃ vivakṣitārthapratyāyane mantharamiti vākyadoṣatā /
GK16visa07cu:1382: iha ke 'pyāhu--”padaśabdena vācakameva prāyaśo nigadyate, na ca naño
GK16visa07cu:1392: hitānna ya iti akramadoṣodāharaṇamiti keṣāñcinmataṃ darśayati--iha ke
GK16visa07cu:1396: vācakameveti padāntare yogaṃ vinā prayogābhāvena pañcapadaṃ tripadamiti yathā na prayogaḥ tathā naño 'pi pratiyogipadayogaṃ vināprayogāt na tatra vācakatā, niyatapadatvaṃ nirvivādamityarthaḥ ghaṭādipadasya tu svataḥ prayogāt tatra padatvaṃ nirvivādamityarthaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1400: tathā ca asthānasthapadatvodāharaṇaṃ tīrthe tadīye ityevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1402: “adyāpi stanaśailadurgaviṣame sīmantinīnāṃ hṛdi sthātuṃ vāñchati māna eṣa dhigati krodhādivālohitaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1403: prodyaddūrataraprasāritakaraḥ karṣatyasau tatkṣaṇā tphullatkairavakoṣaniḥ saradaliśreṇīkṛpāṇāṃ śaśī” //
GK16visa07cu:1404: atra kopina uktau samāso na kṛtaḥ, kaveruktau kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1408: adyāpītyādyuktakrodhādālohitaḥ prodyan asauśaśī phullataḥkairavakuḍmalādiva khaḍgapidhānarūpātkoṣāt niḥ saratām alīnāṃ śreṇībhūtaṃ kṛpāṇāṃ dūrataraṃ prasāritaḥ karo raśmireva tādṛśo hasto yena tādṛśaḥ san tatkṣaṇāt karṣaṇe 'pi hastasya dūre prasāraṇāt /
GK16visa07cu:1418: atra nabho 'ṅgane candraṃ paśya mānaṃ muñceti yuktam /
GK16visa07cu:1423: vadāmi sakhi ! tattvaṃ te kadācinnocitāḥ krudhaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:1430: ramaṇe iti---atra ramaṇe caraṇaprāntapatite satyadhunā krodho nocita iti vākyasya madhye vadāmi sakhi te tattvamiti vākyamanupraviṣṭam /
GK16visa07cu:1453: “vilokya vitate vyomni vidhuṃ muñca ruṣaṃ priye !” atra vitataśabdo mānatyāgaṃ prati na kiñcidupakurute /
GK16visa07cu:1454: adhikapadatve padārthānvayapratīteḥ samakālameva bādhapratibhāsaḥ, iha tu paścāditi viśeṣaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1468: “dehi me vājinaṃ rājan ! gajendraṃ vā madālasam” /
GK16visa07cu:1488: tatra pragapakarṣe udāharati harantīti--iyaṃ lokalocanacandrikāsurūpā tanvī yauryuvabhirvokṣate teṣāṃ yūnāṃ hṛdayaṃ navendukalādayo na harantītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1489: atra ādipadāccandrikāpi ninditā, tanvyāṃ tadāropādutkarṣaḥ pratipāditastadāha---atreti
GK16visa07cu:1494: yathāśu jāyate pāto na tathā punarunnatiḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:1499: stabdhasya bhadrābhadrāvivecinaḥ vivaraṃ parasya cchidraṃ tatra icchāmātraṃ natu pravṛttau tadapekṣā stabdhatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:1501: “varṣatyetadaharpatirna tu ghano dhāmasthāmacchaṃ payaḥ satyaṃ sā savituḥ sutā surasaritpūro yathā plāvitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1502: vyāsasyoktiṣu viśvasityapi na kaḥ, śraddhā na kasya śrutau na pratyeti
GK16visa07cu:1507: sotkaṇṭhavacanamidam---ahaḥ patiḥ sūryyo dhāmasthaṃ svīyaraśmistham etad dṛśyāmānaṃ payo varṣati natu ghano varṣati ghanasya sūryyahastasthānīyatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:1508: tathā yayā surasarito gaṅgāyāḥ pūraḥ pravāhaḥ plāvitaḥ sā arthāt yamunāsavituḥ sūryyasya satyaṃ sutā /
GK16visa07cu:1510: sūryyaprabhavatvaṃ na khalu kenacidanāptenoktaṃ, kintu vyāsena śrutyā
GK16visa07cu:1514: evaṃrūpāsu kālindyāḥ sūryyakanyātvabodhikāsu ca vyāsoktiṣu ko jano na viśvasiti kasya janasyā vā evamarthikāyāṃ śrutau vede na śraddhā ? api pu sarva eva viśvasiti sarvasya ca śraddhā; tathā ca hariṇyā api tatra viśvāsaśraddhaucityameva /
GK16visa07cu:1515: tathāpi mugdhā mūḍhā hariṇī bhāsvanmarīciṣu adhikaraṇeṣu jalaṃ na pratyeti /
GK16visa07cu:1516: dhāmasthamacchaṃ paya ityanena payasaḥ sūryyamarīcivṛttitayā vyāsaśrutibhyāṃ bodhitatvena tathā pratyayocityāt /
GK16visa07cu:1519: vṛṣṭiyamunayoḥ sūryyaprabhavatvaṃ na khalu kenānāptenoktaṃ, kintu vyāsena śrutyā vedācāracaryyayā ceti /
GK16visa07cu:1522: atra prakṛṣṭataraḥ prakṛtoyamarthaḥ-sa nāgaraḥ satyavāgiti prāmāṇikamevedam /
GK16visa07cu:1523: tasya dūtīnāṃ bhavatīnāṃ vāci satyapratyayo yujyate /
GK16visa07cu:1525: kṛgīṇāṃ marumarīcikāsu jalapratyayo yathā, mamāpi bhavatīṣu saṃpratyayastathaiva /
GK16visa07cu:1527: tataśca sūryamarīcīnāṃ jalapratyayahetutvamucitam, tathāpi mṛgī bhrāntatatvāttatra jalapratyayaṃ na karoti /
GK16visa07cu:1536: tatra marīciṣvadhikaraṇeṣu yamunājalasya sūryyaprabhavatvapradarśanāt pipāsayā yamunāyāmeva pravarttate tatra na jalāpratyayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1541: prākaraṇikaścātra nāyāyasiddhe 'pyarthe bhrāntānāṃ janānāṃ pratyayābhāva ityevaṃrūpaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1543: “sadā carati khe bhānuḥ sadā vahati mārutaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1544: sadā dhatte bhuvaṃ śeṣaḥ sadā dhīro 'vikatthanaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:1551: yathā---”sadā carati khe bhānurnityaṃ vahati mārutaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1554: bhānuḥ sadeti--- ṣaṣṭhāṃśavṛtte rājño 'pi ṣaṣṭhāṃśagrahaṇaṃ prajāpālanarūpo dharma eṣaḥ sadaivetyarthaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1558: atrāsya padasya paryāyāntaraṇopādāne 'pi yadi nānyadvicchittyāntaṃ tadāsya

GK16visa07cu:2038: ata eva bālapravāvalaviṭapaprabhāva lateva ityatrāpi vaṭādiviṭame latādarśanāt pravālaviṭape latāṃ sambhāvya tadupamā kṛtā /
GK16visa07cu:2039: prakṛte tu jale jvalanasya sarvathā bādhāt prajvalajjaladhārāyāḥ sambhāvanāśakyatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2061: kṣudre 'pi nūnaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapanne mamatvamuccaiḥ śirasāmatīva” //
GK16visa07cu:2065: yo himālayo guhāsu līnamandhakāraṃ divākarād rakṣati /
GK16visa07cu:2068: uccaiḥ śirasāṃ mahimnā uccamaulīnāmarthānmahatām uccaiḥ śikharāṇāṃ ca
GK16visa07cu:2079: yo himālayaḥ, śiraḥ śṛṅgaṃ mūrdhā vā /
GK16visa07cu:2085: (vi, gha) sahaseti---sā sundarī nāyikā strigdhairālijanaiḥ saha sahasā sasmitā udite rajanīnāthe sahasā tatkṣaṇaṃ kuñjamandiraṃ yātītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2087: (lo, ṛ) ālijanaiḥ saha sārdhaṃ sahasā vegena sahasā hasena saha vartamānā /
GK16visa07cu:2092: “eṣa mūrto yathā dharmaḥ kṣitipo rakṣati kṣitim” /
GK16visa07cu:2096: dharmaḥ puṇyaṃ tasya mūrtyabhāvāttadutprekṣā na tu
GK16visa07cu:2107: (lo, ḷ) vṛttiḥ niyatavarṇagato yo rasaviṣayo vyāpāraḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2123: varmāntaropādāne tu vādhikyam; yathātraiva nabhomaṇḍalamadhyama iti
GK16visa07cu:2132: kamalayā lakṣmyā āliṅgitaḥ, ujjvalahāravāṃśca muraṃ dviṣan murārī rājate /
GK16visa07cu:2134: atra lakṣmīsthānīyā vidyut hārasthānīyāyā bālākāyā nyūnatvamiti bhaṅgyā pratipādayati---atreti
GK16visa07cu:2145: yalliṅgena ekadvyādiyadvacanena copameyoktyupakrama upamānasyāpi talliṅgakatvena tadvacanena coktirākāṅkṣitā tathātvānuktau kramabhaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2155: (lo, o) asyāmupamāyāṃ sarvadāpi bhavatītyanena upamānopameyayoḥ kālabhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2156: “lateva rājase tanvi !” atra latā rājate, tvaṃ tu rājase /
GK16visa07cu:2160: na khalu āsīt iti sārvadikśobhāsattve atītvena tadvivakṣābhāvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2161: atevetyatra puruṣabhedaḥ, latā rājate ityeva sambhavāt /
GK16visa07cu:2163: atra mārkaṇḍeyamunirjāvatyeva, na khalvetadasya “jīvatu” ityanena vidheyam /
GK16visa07cu:2166: ayaṃ ca svalpa eva doṣaḥ vyatyayena anvayasambhavāt /
GK16visa07cu:2167: ata eva sarvatra kāvye īdṛśa eva prayogaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2168: iha tu yatra liṅgavacanabhede 'pi na sādhāraṇadhaparmasyānyathābhāvastatra na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2172: (lo, au) iha tviti---ayamarthaḥ--yatra liṅgādibhede hi sādhāraṇadharṇo 'bhinnaupamānopameyayordvayorapi sambandhamāpādyate tatra na pratīti sthagayati /
GK16visa07cu:2176: dadhate sma parāṃ śobhāṃ tadīyā vibhramā iva” //
GK16visa07cu:2179: yadi tu nirdiṣṭarūpeṇaivobhayatrānvayasambhavastadā na doṣa ityāha---atra ca liṅgavacaneti
GK16visa07cu:2181: atrābhātisādhāraṇadharma ubhayatraikarūpa eva liṅgadvayaṃ tu bhinnam
GK16visa07cu:2183: madhuratayā ramyatayā bhṛtaḥ pūrṇastasyāveśaḥ parāṃ śobhāṃ dadhate dhatta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2187: tadīyā vibhramā iva--te 'pi hi parāṃ śobhāṃ dadhate /
GK16visa07cu:2199: dadhatīti dadhadhātorekavacanāntaṃ, dhādhātorbahuvacanāntaṃ ca tiṅntaṃ ca padam /
GK16visa07cu:2211: savilāsaṃ gacchantīṃ veśyāṃ dṛṣṭvā śāntasya puruṣasyoktiriyam /
GK16visa07cu:2212: he aruṇacaraṇe ! tava parisaraṇaṃ gamanaṃ karttṛ /
GK16visa07cu:2213: akāraṇam arthāt puṃsāṃ raṇaraṇakaṃ kāmacintāṃ kurute janayatītyarthaḥ
GK16visa07cu:2214: parisaraṇaṃ kīdṛśam ? anaṇu analpaṃ raṇantī maṇiyuktā mekhalā yatra
GK16visa07cu:2216: avirataṃśiñjanaṃ mañju mañjīraṃ nūpuraṃ yatra tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2222: evaṃ samāsoktau sādhāraṇaviśeṣaṇavaśātparārthasya pratītāvapi punastasya śabdenopādānasyāprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ vyañjanayaiva prastutārthāvagateḥ śabdena tadabhidhānasya ca punaruktatvam /
GK16visa07cu:2235: aparadik pāścimadigena gaṇikā veśyā viyadrūpādālayād āśrayāt raviṃ nirakāsayat niṣkāsayāmāsa
GK16visa07cu:2239: anu divasasya paścād rāgavantaṃ raktimāvantamapi ata eva locanayoḥ sukhaṃ sukhajanakam atāpakaṃ ca vapurdadhatamapītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2240: atra śliṣṭaviroṣaṇavaśādanurāgavato locanasukhajanakasuśītalavapuṣmato nāyakasya vasunā dhanena rahitatvāt svagṛharūpādālayāt veśyayā niṣkāsanaṃ vyañjanayā pratīyate /
GK16visa07cu:2245: (lo, i) anugato rāgaḥ śoṇimā, premā ca /
GK16visa07cu:2250: “āhūteṣu vihaṅgameṣu maśako nāyān puro vāryate madhye vā dhuri vā
GK16visa07cu:2252: khadyoto 'pi na kampate pracalituṃ madhye 'pi tejasvināṃ dhiksāmānyamacetasaṃ prabhumivānāmṛṣṭatattvāntaram”
GK16visa07cu:2255: anāmṛṣṭaṃ tattvāntaraṃ yena mahīyasāmalpīyasāṃ ca padārthānāṃ bhedo na prakāśyate /
GK16visa07cu:2256: sāmānyaṃ jātiḥ sāmānyasya sarvāsu vibhaktiṣu ekarūpeṇaivāvasthiterityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2257: anucitaṃ ca vyañjanayaiva pratyuta camatkārātiśayadāyitvena gatārthatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2263: anāmṛṣṭam aparibhāvitaṃ tattvaṃ yena tādṛśamantaraṃ mano yasya tādṛśaṃ prabhumiva /
GK16visa07cu:2264: sāmānyasya acetanatvaṃ darśayati---āhūteṣu vihaṅgameṣu vihāyasā gacchatsu janeṣu praṇiṣu āhateṣu vihāyogāmitvāt pura āyān āgacchan maśako
GK16visa07cu:2266: gamanamevātra vidheyaṃ bodhyaṃ tadeva sāmānye cetanatvapratipādanasambhavāt /
GK16visa07cu:2267: tathā tṛṇamaṇistu tṛṇākarṣako 'lpamūlyo maṇiḥ dhuri vā madhye vā vasan rathaśobhākārakamahāmūlyamaṇīnāṃ dhuraṃ rathaśobhākaraṇarūpaṃ dhuraṃ bhāraṃ vidhatte /
GK16visa07cu:2271: madhye vasan ityatra madhyevāridhi vā vasan iti kvacit pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2272: tadā ca madhye vāridheḥ madhye vā vasan punaḥ punarvasannityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2273: maṇīnāṃ vāridhvāsasādharmyānmahāmūlyamaṇīnāṃ dhuraṃ maṇitvena gaṇyatvarūpāṃ dhuraṃ bhāram ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2279: teṣām abhidhānavaśādeva acecasaḥ prabhoḥ vyañjanayā lābhe tadabhidhānaṃ punaruktamityarthaḥ
GK16visa07cu:2288: asya bhūbhujaḥ cakrādhiṣṭhitatāṃ rājamaṇḍalākramaṇaṃ cakrī viṣṇuḥ prayacchat dattavān /
GK16visa07cu:2289: evam ucchritaṃ gotraṃ gotrabhita indraḥ, vṛṣaṃ dharmaṃ vṛṣabhaketuḥ
GK16visa07cu:2291: atraiṣṭakarmasu eṣāṃ karttṛtvaprasiddhirnāsti kintu anuprāsārthameva tathoktam /
GK16visa07cu:2293: (lo, u) caketi---ayamāśayaḥ, cakaprabhṛtīnāṃ ca cakradhiṣṭitatādimātreṇa praśaṃsanaṃ na khalu prasiddham /
GK16visa07cu:2299: raudrādau tu rase 'tyantaṃ duḥ śravatvaṃ guṇo bhavet // VisSd_7.16 //
GK16visa07cu:2301: (lo, ū) adhunā padaniṣṭatvena pañcadhā vibhaktānāmeṣāṃ doṣāṇāṃ kvacit
GK16visa07cu:2306: eṣu cāsvādasvarūpaviṣātmakatayā mukhyaguṇaprakarṣopakāritvādguṇa iti vyapadeśo bhāktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2308: (vi, pa) vaktarīti---samuddhate pracaṇḍe bhīṣaṇe iti yāvat /
GK16visa07cu:2310: nanu mādhuryādaya eva guṇāstatkathaṃ duḥ śravatvāderguṇatvam
GK16visa07cu:2313: teṣāṃ prakarṣarūpo ya upacāraḥ tatkāritvād aupacāriko guṇavyapadeśo yukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2318: “tadvicchedakṛśasya kaṇṭhaluṭhitaprāṇasya me nirdayaṃ krūraḥ pañcaśaraḥ śararatiśitairbhindanmano nirbharam /
GK16visa07cu:2324: tasyā vicchedena kṛśasya kaṇṭhalulitaprāṇasya ca me manaḥ, krūraḥ pañcaśaraḥ atiśitaiḥ śarairnirdayaṃ bhindan, śambhoḥ proddāmanetrānalajvālena samastātmanā karālita āstām /
GK16visa07cu:2326: bhūte prārthini mayi kṛpayā evaṃ kariṣyati /
GK16visa07cu:2328: vicchedakaṇṭhaluṭhitādau chakāraṭhakārādayo varṇā duḥ śravāḥ kupatavaktṛkā guṇāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2331: bhrāntabrahmaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ pravitaratu śivaṃ śāmbhavaṃ tāṇḍavaṃ vaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:2340: śāmbhavaṃ tāṇḍavaṃ nṛtyaṃ vo yuṣmākaṃ śubhaṃ pravitaratu /
GK16visa07cu:2342: mūrddhavyādhūyamānāyā dhvanantyā amaradhunyā gaṅgāyā lolena kallolajālena taraṅgasamūhena uddhūtānāṃ kṣiptānām ambhaḥ kṣodānāṃ jalakaṇānāṃ dambhāt chalāt prasabhaṃ sahasā abhinabho nabhasi kṣiptani nakṣatrāṇāṃ lakṣāṇi---tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2344: ūrddhvanyastayoraṅghridaṇḍayorbhramibhareṇa bhramyādhikyena rabhasodyataḥ sahasodracchataḥ nabhasvataḥ vayoḥ pravegeṇa bhrāntaṃ brahmaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ yatra tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2346: uddhataṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ utkṛtya ityādau bībhatso rasaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2349: raudre duḥ śravatvaṃ yathā mama tātapādānāṃ---
GK16visa07cu:2365: tathāhi puṃso dhvajaḥ patākā sādhanasya sainyasyāntarmadhye praviśyopasarpan gacchan virājate
GK16visa07cu:2370: tathāhi sambādhe saṃkucite sādhanasya yonerantaḥ praviśya upasarpan gatāgataṃ kurvan puṃso dhvajaḥ liṅgaṃ virājate /
GK16visa07cu:2383: yathā--- nirvāṇavairadahanāḥ praśamādarīṇāṃ nandantu pāṇḍutanayāḥ saha mādhavena /
GK16visa07cu:2384: raktaprasādhitabhuvaḥ kṣatavigrahāśca svasthā bhavantu kururājasutāḥ sabhṛtyāḥ //
GK16visa07cu:2392: dhvajaśca sādhanam aśvādi strīvarāṅgaṃ ca piśunayet sūcayet śamakathāyāmaślīlo yathā--- “lattānocchūnamaṇḍūkapāṭitodarasannibhe
GK16visa07cu:2396: yathā---”parvatabhedi pavitraṃ jaitraṃ narakasya bahumataṃ gahanam /
GK16visa07cu:2404: patat pravahat surasarito gaṅgāyā ambho namat /
GK16visa07cu:2408: so 'pi hi parvatabhodinā pavinā vajreṇa trāyate arthāt devān /
GK16visa07cu:2409: ambhaḥ kīdṛśaṃ naraṃkasya pāpajanyayātanāyā jaitraṃ nāśakamityarthaḥ
GK16visa07cu:2410: atra hariṃ śrīkṛṣṇarūpaṃ viṣṇumiveti dṛṣṭāntaḥ so 'pi narakasya narakāsurasya jaitraḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2411: ambhaḥ kīdṛśam---bahumataṃ bahujanasammataṃ gahanaṃ nibiḍaṃ ca pravāhātiśayād atra hariṃ siṃhamiveti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2414: na cātra harimevetyatrānavīkṛtatvaṃ kathitapadatvaṃ vā doṣa iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:2417: (lo, e) parvateti--gaṅgājalapakṣe parvataṃ bhettuṃ śīlaṃ yasya /
GK16visa07cu:2419: indrapakṣe parvatabhodinā pavinā vajreṇa trāyata iti /
GK16visa07cu:2431: pravarttinīṃ pravarttikāṃ prakṛtimāmananti vadanti sattvarajastamasāṃ samyāvasthā prakṛtiḥ tata eva samastapadārthotpattiriti sāṃkhyasiddhāntāt
GK16visa07cu:2433: tathā ca tvāmeva puruṣaṃ sarvakarttṛpuruṣaṃ viduḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2434: tatra kiṃ pramāṇamityata āha---taddarśinamiti---tata eva darśanaṃ jñānaṃ yasya tādṛśam
GK16visa07cu:2445: yaduktam--- prakṛteḥ kiyamāṇāni guṇaiḥ karmāṇi sarvaśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2452: yathā---”yuktaḥ kalābhistamasāṃ vivṛddhyai kṣīṇaśca tābhiḥ kṣataye ya eṣām
GK16visa07cu:2455: (vi, ra) svayaṃ vāpi parāmarśe iti kārikāpādastatrāpratītatvaṃ guṇa
GK16visa07cu:2461: kālābhaiḥ śarīraparigrahecchārūpābhiḥ kalābhiḥ dharmaiḥ viśiṣṭaḥ san yastamasāṃ śarīrātmanorabhedābodharūpāṇāṃ mohānāṃ vivṛddhyai bhavati yathā rāmaśarīraparigrahe /
GK16visa07cu:2462: anyacandrastu svīyaṣoḍaśāṃśarūpābhiḥ kalābhiryuktaḥ san tamasāmandhakāraṇāṃ kṣataye eva bhavati
GK16visa07cu:2463: tathā tābhiḥ kalābhaiḥ hīnaḥ sanneṣāṃ tamasāṃ kṣataye bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:2466: tamonāśakakalābhāvena tasya tamo vṛddhīṃ prati yatsattve 'grimakṣaṇe
GK16visa07cu:2467: yasya sattvaṃ yadasattve 'grimakṣaṇe yadasattvaṃ tattasya kāraṇamityevaṃrūpakāraṇatvāt
GK16visa07cu:2470: atra kalātamaḥ padārthau apratītāvapi svayaṃ parāmarśe guṇau parāpratīteruddeśyatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2472: (lo, o) kalābhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ, tāśca ekādaśendriyāṇi, pañca tanmābhāṇi /
GK16visa07cu:2492: udayasavituruddeśe vihitasya tāmratvasya astamayasavituruddeśenāpi vidheyatayā pratinirdeśarūpo 'nuvāda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2493: “hanta ! hanta ! gataḥ kānto vasante sakhi ! nāgataḥ” /
GK16visa07cu:2524: āvayoḥ sadanaṃ samprati samaṃ, tvatto dhanalābhe tupaścāt samaṃ na bhaviṣyati iti bhāvaḥ
GK16visa07cu:2525: pṛthūni kārttasvarasya suvarṇasya pātrāṇi yatra rājasadanaṃ tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2526: pṛthukānāṃ śiśūnām ārttasvarasya pātraṃ daridrasadanaṃ bhakṣyābhāvāt
GK16visa07cu:2527: bhūṣitāḥ suvarṇadimāṇḍitāḥ niḥ śeṣaparijanāḥ yatra rājasadanaṃ tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2528: bhuvi uṣitāḥ suptāḥ niḥ śeṣaparijanā yatra daridrasadanaṃ tādṛśaṃ śayyāvirahāt /
GK16visa07cu:2530: vilasatkā bile tiṣṭhanto mūṣikapipīllikādayasteṣāṃ reṇubhiḥ gahanaṃ daridrasadanam /
GK16visa07cu:2535: (lo, au) pṛthviti---pṛthukānāṃ balānām ārttasvarasya pātraṃ sthānam /
GK16visa07cu:2538: vilasantaḥ tiṣṭhanta eva vilasatkā reṇavo dhūlayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2552: dīdhīvevīṅ iti kaścijjano guṇavṛddhyorabhājanaṃ guṇavṛddhyā ca hīna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2553: dīdhīvevīṅ dhātvoriḍāgamasya ca samastayorapi guṇasya tadvādhikāyā vṛddheścābhāvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2554: tathā kaścijjanaḥ kvip pratyayanibhaḥ, yatra jane sannihite sati tatsannihitasyāpi na te guṇavṛddhī, kvippratyayasannihitadhātorapi guṇavṛddhyabhāvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2562: kvippratyayanibhaḥ kvipaḥ sarvāpahārīti lopād ripoḥ sarvanāśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2563: atra na kevalaṃ duḥ śravatvaṃ kaṣṭatvaṃ ca /
GK16visa07cu:2572: he upādhyāya ! atra loke tvāmahaṃ kadācana na atārpsam /
GK16visa07cu:2574: asya vaiyākaraṇasya vaktṛtve kaṣṭatvaṃ duḥ śravatvamapi guṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2580: ede assasamohā paḍanti āsāsu duddhadhāra vva” //
GK16visa07cu:2587: ete cāsya mayūkhāḥ patīnti āśāsu dugdhadhārā iva //
GK16visa07cu:2589: (vi, ka) hyo godohodbhavaṃ ghṛtaṃ haiyaṅgavīna bhakṣyalampaṭasyoktau bhakṣyadravyadṛṣṭānto 'tra gramyo guṇaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2592: eso iti--- “eṣaḥ śaśadharabimbo dṛśyate haiyaṅgavīnapiṇḍa iva /
GK16visa07cu:2593: ete cāsya mayūkhāḥ patantyāśāsu dugdhadhārā iva” //
GK16visa07cu:2594: nirhetutā tu khyāter'the doṣatāṃ naiva gacchati /
GK16visa07cu:2596: kavīnāṃ samaye khyāte guṇaḥ khyātaviruddhatā // VisSd_7.22 //
GK16visa07cu:2598: malinyaṃ vyomni pāpe, yaśasi dhavalatā varṇyate hāsakīrtyoḥ raktau ca
GK16visa07cu:2600: toyādhāre 'khile 'pi prasarati ca marālādikaḥ pakṣisaṅgho jyotsnā peyā
GK16visa07cu:2603: (vi, kha) sampratīti---sandhyāsamayasya cakravākadvandvavighaṭakatve teṣāṃ khyātisattvānnātra hetvākāṅkṣā /
GK16visa07cu:2606: satkarmaṇā kīrtiḥ, dāne ca yaśa iti yaśakīrttyorbhedaḥ, marālo haṃsaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2607: pādāghātādaśokaṃ vikasati bakulaṃ yoṣitāmāsyamadyair- yūnāmaṅgeṣu hārāḥ,
GK16visa07cu:2609: maurvīrolambamālā dhanuratha viśikhāḥ kausumāḥ puṣpaketo- rbhinnaṃ syādasya bāṇairyuvajanahṛdayaṃ strīkaṭākṣeṇa tadvat // VisSd_7.24 //
GK16visa07cu:2613: (lo, i) hāro hṛdayaṃ ca sphuṭatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2616: ahnyambhojaṃ, niśāyāṃ vikasati kumudaṃ, candrikā śuklapakṣe meghadhvāneṣu
GK16visa07cu:2617: nṛtyaṃ bhavati ca śikhināṃ nāpyaśoke phalaṃ syāt /
GK16visa07cu:2618: na syājjātī vasante; na ca kusumaphale gandhasāradrumāṇā-
GK16visa07cu:2624: atra jyāśabdenāpi gatārthatve dhanuḥ śabdena jyāyā dhanuṣyāyattīkaraṇaṃ bodhyate /
GK16visa07cu:2637: tadvodhaśca dhanuḥ śabdādau dhanurārūḍhatvaṃ lakṣaṇayā rūḍhihetukayā luptaṣaṣṭyartho vā ārūḍhatvam
GK16visa07cu:2638: gatārthatvepīti--na ca jyāśabdārthaḥ kathaṃ dhanurjyātvasya saṃsthānaviśeṣavyaṅgyajātiviśeṣa iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:2639: jyātvasya jātitve 'pi tatsambandhino dhanuṣo namayataḥ smārakatvena tadvaśādeva dhanurlābhe, dhanuḥ padasyādhikyaprasakterārūḍhatvapratipādanena niravasitatvāt, yatra karṇasthitatve 'piatra punaruktiprasāktivāraṇameva karṇāvataṃsyāpi savataṃsapadārthatvāt na caivaṃ karṇasthaitalakṣaṇāyāmapi karṇasthitakarṇabhūṣā iti bodhanenaiva punaruktiriti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:2641: evaṃ śravaṇeti--etaddvaye padādhikyasyaiva prasāktiḥ kuṇḍalatvakirīṭatvayoḥ saṃsthānavyaṅgyajātitvādeva
GK16visa07cu:2642: evaṃ nirupapado mālāśabdaḥ puṣpastrajamevābhidhatta iti sthitāvapi
GK16visa07cu:2649: utkṛṣṭapuṣpaprasiddhyai iti puṣpāṃśo mālāśabdārtha eva puṣpaśabdasya tu utkṛṣṭe lakṣaṇetyarthaḥ
GK16visa07cu:2652: muktāṃśo 'pi hāraśabdārtha eva ityato 'trāpi punaruktereva prasiktiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2655: dhanurjyādayaḥ satkāvyasthitā eva nibaddhavyāḥ, na tvasthitā jaghanakāñjīkarakaṅkaṇādayaḥ
GK16visa07cu:2657: (vi, ca) satkāvyasthitā eveti---yataḥ satkāvye sthitā ato nibaddhavyā evetyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2664: mā mā mānada ! māti māmalamiti kṣāmākṣarollāpinī suptā kiṃ nu mṛtā nu kiṃ
GK16visa07cu:2665: manasi me līnā vilīnā nu kim” //
GK16visa07cu:2669: gāṭhāliṅganena vāmanīkṛtakucā cāsau prodbhinnaromodramā ceti samāsaḥ
GK16visa07cu:2671: sāndrasneharasātirekeṇa vigalat śrīmato nitambādambaraṃ yasyāstādṛśaviśeṣaṇadvayavatī sā mama nāyikā pīḍayetyanuktivaśāt, he mānada ! māṃ mā mā mā ityalimityevamalakṣarollāpinī satī
GK16visa07cu:2674: manogatatvena manasi layavitarkaḥ manasoradyāpi abahirbhāvāt atyantalayarūpasya vilayasya vitarkaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2677: kim ? uktarūpā priyā mama manasi suptā nu ! sthiratayā varttamānatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2678: suptāpi punarutthāya pātītyāśaṅkyāha mṛtā nu kim ? sāpi parairbahiṣkartuṃ śakyā ityata āha---līneti
GK16visa07cu:2684: etatpratipādikāyā nāyikāyāḥ sāndrānandajaḍībhūtatayā saṅkīrṇavākyoccāraṇe 'pyasāmarthyaṃ vyanaktīti nyūnapadatvaṃ guṇaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2689: “tiṣṭhetkopavaśātprabhāvapihitā dīrghaṃ na sā kupyati svargāyotpatitā bhavenmayi punarbhāvārdramasyā manaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2690: tāṃ hartuṃ vibudhadviṣo 'pi na ca me śaktāḥ purovartinīṃ sā
GK16visa07cu:2694: sā urvaśī svaprabhāvena pihitā adṛśyā tiṣṭhaditi vitarkyāha--dīrghaṃ
GK16visa07cu:2695: na sā iti evaṃ svargāya iti vitarkyāha---mayi punariti /
GK16visa07cu:2696: asyā asureṇa haraṇakoṭistu asambhavyā ityāha---tāṃ hartumiti /
GK16visa07cu:2700: atra prabhāvapihitetiṃ bhavediti cetyanantaraṃ “naitadyataḥ” iti padāni nyūnāni /
GK16visa07cu:2705: (vi, jha) atreti---pūrvoktasya niṣedhaṃ pratyeva dīrghaṃ na sā ityanayoḥ hetutvāt natu pūrvapratītiṃ prati iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2706: nanūtkarṣasyākaraṇāt mā bhavatu guṇatvaṃ, doṣatvaṃ tu syādityata
GK16visa07cu:2713: prabhāvena divyena pihitā, adṛśyā sā urvaśī /
GK16visa07cu:2719: tanna na jāne jāne spṛśati manaḥ kiṃ tu naiva niṣṭhuratām” //
GK16visa07cu:2726: (vi, ña) guṇaḥ kvāpīti---yatrādhikapadasya rūḍhilakṣaṇayā arthāntaraṃ tatretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2727: ācāratīti---manaso 'pyagocarānarthāt asadarthān sahasā yat durjana ācarati tadahaṃ na na jāne
GK16visa07cu:2728: api tvahameva jāne ityarthaḥ, kintu mama bhanaḥ niṣṭhuratāṃ naiva spṛśati ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2731: samāptapunarā ttatvaṃ na doṣo na guṇaḥ kvacit /
GK16visa07cu:2734: evaṃ ca viśeṣaṇamātrasya punarupādāne samāptapunarāttatvaṃ na vākyāntarasyeti vijñeyam /
GK16visa07cu:2736: (vi, ṭa) anyastā ityatra pūrvārddhena vākyasamāptāvapi kathamatra niṣpādakaguṇaratnādīnāṃ vailakṣaṇyamityākāṅkṣotthānādadoṣatā /
GK16visa07cu:2738: viśeṣaṇamātrasya ityatrāpi anākāṅkṣitasyeti bodhyaṃ, viśeṣaṇe ākāṅkṣāsattve tu na doṣa iti prāgeva darśitam /
GK16visa07cu:2739: tathā cākāṅkṣāyā eva niyāmakatvaṃ; na vākyatvaviśeṣaṇatvayoriti sthitena vākyāntarasyeti yaduktaṃ tadvākyāntare ākāṅkṣā avaśyaṃ
GK16visa07cu:2748: “diṅmātaṅgaghaṭāvibhaktacaturāghāṭā mahī sādhyate siddhā sāpi vadanta eva
GK16visa07cu:2750: viprāya pratipādyate kimaparaṃ rāmāya tasmai namo yasmātprādurabhūtkathādbhutamidaṃ yatraiva cāstaṃ matam” //
GK16visa07cu:2751: atra vadanta evetyādi vākyaṃ vākyāntarapraveśāt camatkārātiśayaṃ puṣṇāti /
GK16visa07cu:2755: tathā ca diṅmātaṅgaghaṭābhirvibhaktāścatvāraḥ paryantāḥ yasyāḥ tādṛśī mahī yena rāmeṇa sādhyate
GK16visa07cu:2756: siddhā vyāghātaśūnyasādhanena svavaśīkṛtā sāpi mahī viprāya pratipādyate /
GK16visa07cu:2758: tasmai rāmāya nama idaṃ kāthādbhutaṃ yasmāt prādurabhūt anyairatathākāraṇāt yasmādeva prādurabhūdityarthaḥ
GK16visa07cu:2759: yatraiva cāstaṃ gataṃ, kenāpyutrakālaṃ tathākaraṇādastaṃ gatamityevaṃ
GK16visa07cu:2760: vadanta eva vayaṃ romāñcitā eva idaṃ paśyatetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2772: uttaṃsayiṣyati kacāṃstava devi ! bhīma ityatra sukumāratayā
GK16visa07cu:2782: yatrānubhāvavibhāvamukhena pratipādane viśadapratītirnāsti, yatra ca vibhāvānubhāvakṛtapuṣṭirāhityamevānuguṇaṃ
GK16visa07cu:2784: (vi, ṇa) vibhāvānubhāvakṛteti---vyabhicāribhāvasya yau vibhāvānubhāvau tābhyāṃ vyaṅgyatvarūpāyā vyabhicāribhāvasya puṣṭistadrāhityamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2787: “autsukyena kṛtasvarā sahabhuvā vyāvartamānā hriyā taistairbandhuvadhūjanasya vacanairnotābhimukhyaṃ punaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2788: dṛṣṭvāgre varamāttasādhvasarasā gaurī nave sahgame saṃhohatpulakā hareṇa hasatā śliṣṭā śivāyāstu vaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:2791: gaurī nave saṃgame prathamadine harasānnidhyanimittamautsukyena kṛtatvārānantaraṃ ca sahabhuvā sāhajikayā hriyā vyāvarttamānā tataśca taistairityādi /
GK16visa07cu:2792: tataśca varaṃ svāminaṃ haram agre dṛṣṭvā āttasādhvasarūparasā,
GK16visa07cu:2793: tataśca hasatā hareṇaśliṣṭā satī saṃrohatpulakā īdṛśī vaḥ śivāyāstu /
GK16visa07cu:2800: vivalanādirūpānubhāvamukhena yathā lajjādipratipādranaṃ tathā sahasā prasāraṇarūpānubhāvamukhena autsukyasya pratipādane na viśadapratītiriti vyabhicāriṇaḥ svaśabdapratipādanamevocitamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2801: atrautsukyasya tvarārūpānubhāvamukhena pratipādane saṅgame na jhaṭiti
GK16visa07cu:2809: evaṃ hriyo 'pyanubhāvavyāvarttanāt na jhaṭiti tatpratītiḥ ityataḥ tasyāpi hriyeti śabdasya vācyatvaṃ na doṣa ityāha---hriyo 'nubhāvasya ceti
GK16visa07cu:2811: sādhvasaṃ bhayaṃ hāsaśca hāsyahetuścetovikāsaḥ sthāyibhāvalakṣaṇe darśitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2812: taddvayaṃ ca bhayānakahāsyarasayoḥ sthāyibhāvāvapi gauramaheśayoḥ śṛṅgare 'tra vyabhicārabhāvau
GK16visa07cu:2816: maheśahāsaścoddīpanavibhāvastataśca sādhvasahāsāvanupādāya yadi sakampā iti kriyeta tadā tadaṅgasarpadarśanāt bhayena ārdragajacarmakapāladarśanāt jugupsayā ca śṛṅgārapratikūlābhyāṃ tatkampasambhavāt na śṛṅgāravyabhicāriṇoḥ sādhvasahāsayoreva vyañjanā
GK16visa07cu:2823: yathā--”kvākāryaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulam-” ityādi /
GK16visa07cu:2828: viruddharasīyasyāpi tasya balavatā bādhyasya bādhyatvena kathanaṃ virodhino jaye yathātathā guṇaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2835: kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ pāsyatyanena vyaṅgyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2836: virādhino 'pi smaraṇo sāmyena vacane 'pi vā // VisSd_7.30 //
GK16visa07cu:2839: (vi, dha) virodhino 'pi iti---virodhirasasyāpi sañcāryyādeḥ smaraṇi smaryyamāṇatvena vyañjitasya vacane sāmyena vathane 'pi prakṛtarasena saha na virodho bhavet /
GK16visa07cu:2843: atrālambanavicchede raterarasātmatayā smaryamāṇānāṃ tadaṅgānāṃ śokoddīpakatayā kuṇānukūlatā
GK16visa07cu:2855: nṛpā ruṣā bhejire prapedire priyatamayā iva /
GK16visa07cu:2857: ruṣo raktavarṇanaṃ kavisampradāyasiddham, pakṣe tu priyatamatvena
GK16visa07cu:2859: strutaṃ kṣaritaṃ ghanaṃ gharmatoyaṃ rājñāṃ yataḥ, ruṣā tādṛśyā,
GK16visa07cu:2860: strutaṃ niḥ sṛtaṃ ghanaṃ gharmatoyaṃ gātrāt yasyāstādṛśyā priyatamayā /
GK16visa07cu:2863: pīṭhasya pṛthutvaṃ vistāraḥ, urutvaṃ uccatvaṃ, priyatamayā tu svīyakarāhatyā pṛthoḥ svorudeśarūpasya pīṭhasya dhvananam /
GK16visa07cu:2873: raudrasasthāyibhāvaḥ krodho 'tra prakrāntavīrarasasya vyabhicāribhāvastadvyaṅgyasya prakṛtabīrarasasya sāmyenātra sarāgatvādivyaṅgyaḥ sambhogaśṛṅgāro vivakṣita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2874: nanu priyatamayā iva ityuktyā priyatamaiva sāmyena vivakṣitā, na tu śṛṅgāra ityata āha---anubhāvasāmyeneti
GK16visa07cu:2882: “ekaṃ dhyānimīlanānmukulitaprāyaṃ dvitīyaṃ punaḥ pārvatyā vadanāmbujastanabhare sambhogabhāvālasam
GK16visa07cu:2887: samādhisamaye vibhinnarasaṃ śambhoḥ netratrayaṃ vaḥ pātu /
GK16visa07cu:2889: kvacittu dhyānanimīlanāt mukulataprāyamiti pāṭhaḥ, tadā mukulitaṃ mukulaśabdāt ktapratyayena mukulatulyam /
GK16visa07cu:2896: dūre vikṛṣṭacāpo yo madanaḥ tadviṣaye krodhānalenoddīpitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2902: (lo, a) atra śānteti---aṅgino bhagavadviṣayaratibhāvasya aṅgabhāvena viruddhānāmapi śāntādīnāṃ nānyo 'nyavirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2904: “kṣipto hastāvalagnaḥ prasabhamabhihato 'pyādadānoṃ'śukāntaṃ gṛhṇan keśeṣvapāstaścaraṇanipatito nekṣitaḥ saṃbhrameṇa /
GK16visa07cu:2905: āliṅgan yo 'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhaiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:2907: (vi, bha) itthamaṅgini virodhināṃ sākṣādavirodhaṃ darśayitvā sākṣāt paramparābhyāṃ tādṛśānāmavirodhamāha---yathā vā---kṣipta iti /
GK16visa07cu:2908: tripurudāhe sa prasiddhaḥ śāmbhavaḥ śarāgnirvo duritaṃ dahatu /
GK16visa07cu:2909: kīdṛśaḥ hastāvalagnaḥ san sāśrunetrotpalābhistripurayuvatibhirārdraparādhaḥ kāmīva kṣiptaḥ evamaṃśukasyāntamādadāno 'pi abhihataḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2914: kāmī tu caraṇanipatitaḥ saṃbhrameṇādareṇa yat īkṣaṇaṃ tadviṣayo na kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2918: tasyāḥ paripoṣakatayā bhagavatastripuradhvaṃsaṃ pratyutsāhasyāparipuṣṭatayā rasapadavīmaprāptatayā bhāvamātrasya karuṇo
GK16visa07cu:2921: evaṃ cāviśrāntidhāmatayā karuṇasyāpyaṅgataiveti dvayorapi karuṇaśṛṅgārayorbhagavadutsāhaparipuṣṭatadviṣayaratibhāvāsvādaprakaṣrakatayā yaugapadyasambhāvādaṅgatvena na virodhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2923: (vi, ma) kavigatā kaviniṣṭhā pradhānam, sa dahatu ityādi
GK16visa07cu:2930: sa cātra vyaṅgya ityato vīrarasa evātra pradhānam /
GK16visa07cu:2931: tat kathaṃ ratibhāvasya prādhānyamuktam ityata āha---tasya
GK16visa07cu:2933: tasyotsāhasya sākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyatvena dahatviti nirākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyakavibhāvāṅgatvenāprādhānyarūpayā aparipuṣṭatayā rasapadavīmanāptatayā bhāvamātrasya sthāyibhāvasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2941: itthaṃ bhagavadutsāhapuṣṭasya bhagavadviṣayakavibhāvasya sākṣātparamparābhyāmaṅgabhūtau karaṇaśṛṅgārau virodhisvarūpau api aviruddhau iti darśayati---evaṃ cāviśrāntīti /
GK16visa07cu:2943: bhagavadutsāhastu aṅgamapi bhāvasyāvirodhitvāt tadvirodho na darśitaḥ
GK16visa07cu:2944: nanu smaryyamāṇavibhāvādivyaṅgyasya rasasyāpi, smaryyamāṇasya vibhāvādisāmyasya vivakṣādhīnavivakṣitasāmyasya aṅgirasena saha virodhaprasaktāvapi na virodhaityuktam, aṅgirasena saha virodhaprasaktireva nāstītyāśaṅkate---
GK16visa07cu:2954: tathā hi yāsāṃ tripurayuvatīnāṃ praṇayaroṣanivāraṇārthaṃ kāmī nirākṛtahastagrahaṇāni kṛtavān
GK16visa07cu:2955: tāsveva niṣkaruṇāsu śāmbhavaḥ śarāgnistathā ceṣṭitavāniti sādṛśyasaṃdarśanāt smaryyamāṇenerṣyavipralambhena karuṇaḥ pratyuta puṣṭaṃ nītaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2957: nanu samūhālambanātmakapūrṇaghanānandarūpasya rasasya tādṛśenetararasena kathaṃ virodhaḥ sambhāvanīyaḥ ? ekavākye niveśaprādurbhāvairyaugapadyaviraheṇa parasparopamardakatvānupapatteḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2961: nirākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyatvenākāṅkṣāpūrttyā pūrṇasya ghanasya viṣayāntarāgrahaṇe nibiḍasyā'nandarūpasya rasasya aṅgirasasya tādṛśena
GK16visa07cu:2962: smaryamāṇena vivakṣitasāmyena vā rasena saha kathaṃ virodhaḥ sambhāvanīya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2967: tulyabalatvābhāvena pradhānabhūtena nirākāṅkṣavidheyavākyena vyaṅgyatayā pradhānena aṅhirasena balavatā smaryamāṇopamānayoreva upamardanāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2968: na cāyaṃ sa rasanotkarṣotyādau nirākāṅkṣavākyaireva smaryamāṇaśṛṅgāra iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:2971: teṣāṃ vidheyapātityaṃ tu karuṇavyañjakameva śṛṅgārasya vyaṅgyatve 'pi
GK16visa07cu:2981: kṣipta ityādivākyānāṃ kāmīva ityādivākyasya canirākāṅkṣatvena tadvyaṅgyatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2984: (lo, i) nanu samūhetyādi--yadi rasayorvirodhaḥ syāt, yadi vā aṅgāṅgi
GK16visa07cu:3000: ata evātra pradhānetareṣu raseṣu svātantryaviśrāmarāhityātpūrṇarasabhāvamātrācca vilakṣaṇatayā saṃcārirasanāmnā vyapadeśaḥ prācyānām /
GK16visa07cu:3004: ekavākyavyaṅgyatvābhāve 'pi dvayornirākaṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyatve 'pi ca śṛṅgāravati karuṇāpratītyā virodhāprasaktirastyeva /
GK16visa07cu:3005: kintu smaryamāṇaśṛṅgārapekṣayā anubhūyamānasyopamānaśṛṅgārāpekṣayā upameyasya ca karuṇasya paryantikapratītiviṣayatayā prādhānyam /
GK16visa07cu:3006: evaṃ karuṇāpekṣayā bhagavati kavibhāvasya ca pāryantikapratītiviṣayatvena prādhānyam /
GK16visa07cu:3007: ityataḥ tādṛśapradhānetareṣu karuṇetaratra śṛṅgāre bhāvetaratra karuṇe ślokāntare cānyetaratra anyasmin rase ca pāryantikapratītiviṣayatārūpasvatantraviśrāntirāhityāt tadvaśena pūrṇarasabhāvamātrānmukhyarasāt vilakṣaṇatayā vyapadeśaviśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3023: ekapadyabodhyatārūpāt saṃsargāt yadi rasāntare aṅgaprakarṣakaṃ syāttadā bādhya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3027: atathābhūtasya ca bādhyatvaṃ svaṇḍarasatvaṃ ca ityuktam /
GK16visa07cu:3030: bhāvamātravailakṣaṇyenāpātatamātrataḥ prādhānyenābhivyaktaḥ samagraṃ nāsvādyata iti pastantratvāt, nyūnāṅgasamagrīkatvāt, samagrāpuṣṭatvācca /
GK16visa07cu:3033: (vi, śa) yatra tu kapole jānakyā ityatra vilodhinoḥ
GK16visa07cu:3034: śṛṅgāravīrarasayornedṛśo bādhyabādhakabhāvastatra tayoḥ kathaṃ sanniveśa ityāśaṅkya tu vīraśṛṅgārayorvirodhaṃ paroktaṃ darśayati---nanvādya iti /
GK16visa07cu:3036: ityuktanayena viruddhayoḥ kathamekatra vīraśṛṅgārayoḥ sanniveśa ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3042: muhuḥ paśyañchṛṇvan rajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭgranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ”
GK16visa07cu:3046: ślokārthastu raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ prabhuḥ rāmaḥ jānakyā vaktrakamalaṃ muhuḥ paśyan kharadūṣaṇādirajanicarasenākalakalaṃ śṛṇvān jaṭājūṭasya jaṭāsamūhasya granthiṃ draḍhayati /
GK16visa07cu:3047: vaktrakamalaṃ kīdṛśaṃ karikalabhadantadyutimuṣi kapole smareṇajānakīniṣṭhena rāmaviṣayakasmareṇa smeraḥ harṣaprāyaḥ sphārī vistṛtaḥ uḍḍāmaro bāhulyāt udbhaṭaḥ pulako yasya tādṛśaṃ vaktrakamalam ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3049: jaṭājuṭadraḍhanavyaṅgyo vīrarasaśca parasparamabādhyatam anaṅgatāṃ cāpannau svātantryeṇa upalabhyeti
GK16visa07cu:3051: atrocyate---iha khalu rasānāṃ virodhitāyā avirodhitāyāśca tridhā vyavasthā
GK16visa07cu:3064: tridhāpyālambanetyādinā kapole jānakyā ityādau bhinne ālambane vīrasya rajanīcarasenā, śṛṅgārasyajānakīti
GK16visa07cu:3065: evaṃ ca vīrasya nāyakaniṣṭhatvena bhayānakasya pratināyakaniṣṭhatvena nibandhe bhinānaśrayatvena na virodhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3068: prakṛte tu jānakyālambanakaḥ śṛṅgāro, rajanīcarālambanakastu vīrarasa ityavirodha iti samādhāsyan āha---atrecyate /
GK16visa07cu:3071: tatra yasya yena saha vilodhastaṃ darśayati---tatra vīraśṛṅgārayoriti
GK16visa07cu:3075: yathā mama---prauḍhāmādāya bhītiṃ manasi sarabhasaṃ prāpya lokāpakīrtiṃ naiva stokāpyapekṣākriyata pathi pathi prāktanāsu priyāsu /
GK16visa07cu:3076: śrīmanniḥ śaṅkabhānoḥ samaraparisaradbhīmmaniḥ sīmasenā- niḥ śāṇasvānaśaṅkākulamapasaratāṃ pañcagauḍeśvereṇa /
GK16visa07cu:3078: yaśca nāgānande praśamāśrayasyāpi jīmūtavāhanasya malayavatyanurāgo darśitaḥ, tatra “aho gītamaho vāditram” ityadbhutasyāntarā niveśanānnairantaryābhāvānna śāntaśṛṅgārayorvirodhaḥ ekamanyadapi jñeyam /
GK16visa07cu:3080: (vi, ha) nanu śāntaśṛṅgārayornairantaryye virodhaścet kathaṃ nāgānande na tathā nibaddhamityata āha---yattviti /
GK16visa07cu:3087: saśoṇitaiḥ kavyabhujāṃ sphuradbhiḥ pakṣaiḥ khagānāmupavījyamānān saṃvījitāścandanavārisekaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ kalpalatādukūlaiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3088: vimānaparyyaṅkatale niṣaṇṇāḥ kutūhalāviṣṭatayā tadānīm nirddiśyamānān lalanāṅgulibhirvorāḥ svadehān patitānapaśyan /
GK16visa07cu:3094: (vi, ka) nanu paripanthirasāṅgasya vibhāvādeḥ parigraho doṣa ityuktam, tatkatham “pāṇḍu kṣāmaṃ vadanaṃ hṛdayaṃ sarasaṃ tavālasaṃ ca
GK16visa07cu:3101: he sakhi ! tava pāṇḍukṣāmavadanādikaṃ tava hṛdantaḥ kṣetriyarogam asmin kṣetre śarīre 'cikitsyaṃ rogamāvedayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3105: ubhayīyatve tu prakaraṇasācivyāt prakṛtasabodhāt na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3108: yadi khalu pāṇḍutvādīnāṃ vipralambhāpekṣayādhikā karuṇāṅgatā bhavet tadaiva doṣaḥ syādityarthaḥ
GK16visa07cu:3110: anukāre ca sarveṣāṃ doṣāṇāṃ naiva doṣatā // VisSd_7.31 //
GK16visa07cu:3120: adoṣatā ca guṇatā jñeyā cānubhayātmatā // VisSd_7.32 //
GK16visa07cu:3123: (vi, ga) ityaucityāt evam aucityāt, adoṣatā guṇatā iti /
GK16visa07cu:3127: doṣatāguṇatayorvyātireko hi na doṣatā na guṇatā /
GK16visa07cu:3137: iti sāhityadarpaṇe doṣanirūpaṇo nāma saptamaḥ paricchedaḥ /
